m utsāritānucitadhārṣṭyaparigrahatvāt |

aṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
atha tapanabhayānniśāṅganayāḥ śaśadharamaṇḍaladarpaṇe 'stasānau|

diśi diśi dadṛśe niśāntapaṅktiḥ samaravimardabhuvaṃ viḍambayantī||90||
amṛdu mamṛduṣā ni'sātamastadvyatikaradoṣamalīmasatvamāptāḥ|
sphurāruṇarucā ruṣeva dūraṃ divasakareṇa nirāsire daśāśāḥ||91||
udayagirimathodito vivasvānvicakariṣuḥ kiraṇair niśāndhakāram|
sphuradaruṇimabhiḥ karairakārṣīddavadahanairiva ruddhasarvadikkam||92||
grahapaṭalamaśe.amūṣuṣībhirdinakaradīdhitibhiḥ kṛtābhighātam|
timiramapādantarikṣamārgātkuvalayavṛndamivābhranirjhariṇyāḥ||93||
kṣitidharatanayeva pūritāśā prahatanirargaladundubhipraṇādaiḥ|
śriyamabhṛta niśāvasānalīlā navamaharāgamasaṃmadaṃ vahantī||94||
vighaṭitatimiraughadigvibhāgaprakaṭanabhasyabhavanniśāvasāne|
sphuṭadalanamanāśca padmakhaṇḍāḥ sapadi himetaradīdhitiśca teṣām||95||
diśi diśi niśi saṃbhṛtaṃ karāgraistimiramanargalamaryamācakhaṇḍat|
kṣaṇamapi sahate nahi pragalbhāṃ kvacidahitasya puraḥ sthitiṃ mahasvī||96||
sphuradaviralakesarārgalāṅkaprakaṭapalāśakavāṭapadmagehāḥ|
madhupaśabarasaṃniveśapallyo diśi diśi śiśriyire śriyaṃ nalinyaḥ||97||
dayitamatiruṣā vilokayantyaḥ sarasavipakṣanakhakṣatāṅkitāṅgam|
abhavadaruṇitākṣṇi tatra nūnaṃ nivasati cittabhuvaḥ pratāpavahniḥ||98||
pramadagalitatārakāṃśuśārīkṛtarucirodarabāṣpabindubhaṅgyā|
abhisarati rasārdratāṃ vidhitsurdrutamaparāparanetramaṇḍalīva||99||
vikasanarabhasena hṛtprave'saprasaramivābigatasay dātumantaḥ|
apasaratitarāṃ rasātibhārasphuṭataramantharitāpi pakṣmapaṅktiḥ||100||
sarabhasamapi tārakaḥ kathaṃcidvrajati na yāvadapāṅgavartma dīrgham|
saratisapadi tatprabhā purastāccirapi tāvadivākṣamā visoḍhum||101||
iti dayitavilokanābhilāṣasphuraṇapṛthūbhavadātmanastaruṇyāḥ|
smaraśarataralākṛterjajṛmbhe nayanayugasya sarāgavibhramā śrīḥ||102||
(cakkalakam)
śrutipathajuṣi tāratūryanāde taraladṛśamalasaṃ vikāsalakṣmīm|
yadukulamiva netrayugmamāpnodanavamakṛṣṇavalakṣatābhirāmam||103||
pramadabharabhṛtaḥ kapolabhāgātkamaladṛśo 'gurupaṅkapattrabhaṅgaḥ|
vyagaladatanubāṣpapātabhinno nanu malinasya kutaściraṃ vyavasthā||104||
prathamamatanurāgasaṃpadaṃ tāṃ caramamanujjhitapūrvarūpaśobhām|
uṣasi rucamavāpya sādhumaitrīṃ na khalu tarāṃ jahṛṣurna cakravākāḥ||105||
dhavalabisalatā rasena kokaḥ pravikaṭacañcupuṭoddhṛtāścakhāda|
krudha iva śaśino viyogahetorgaganatalātpatitāḥ kalāḥ kahaṃcit||106||
sarasi vikaṭacañcukoṭilagnāṃ sarabhasavṛttirupetya cakravākyāḥ|
hṛda iva virahavyathāśalākāṃ bisakalikāṃ vicakarṣa cakravākaḥ||107||
cañcvagrakhaṇḍitamukhādvicakarṣa sūtra-
jālaṃ mṛṇāla'sakalātkṣaṇadāpriyasya|
koko nilīnamahimāṃśubhayāttadīya-
randhrodareṣu karacakramiva krudhendoḥ||108||
visrastapattrapuṭakesarakoṭidaṣṭa-
paryantabhāgavikaṭonnatakarṇikāgrāḥ|
ucchvāsabhagnaharitacchavayor 'karaśmi-
jālairajṛmbhiṣata paṅkajakoṣadaṇḍāḥ||109||
dikpadminīparisarāspadatāmrapādaḥ
kurvanvikāsiṣu ruciṃ nalineṣu haṃsaḥ|
āpīvaroḍupatibimbamṛṇāladaṇḍa-
khaṇḍāccakarṣa śanakaiḥ karasūtrajālam||110||
āpātabhītinamitonnamitārdhadeha-
baddhasthirakramavidhūtapatatrapaṅktiḥ|
uccaiḥ kvaṇannavatatāra nivāsayaṣṭi-
koṭeḥ śikhī vidhurayanvirahāturāḥ strīḥ||111||
abhyutthitā śayanastvaritaṃ yiyāsuḥ
saṃpīḍitocchvasitanīvinitambabimbam|
saṃpaśyator 'dhavinimīlitadṛṣṭi bhartu-
raṅke hriyā kila papāta cakoracakṣuḥ||112||
śroṇītaṭe na raśanā karajakṣatāṅka-
saṃjatagāḍharuji cārudṛśā babandhe|
bhūṣā parā guruṇi tatpadapaṅktireva
tasmiṃstu kāñcanaśilāvikaṭe tadāsīt||113||
ākṛṣya pāṇikamalena ca karṇapālī-
mekena vallabhavilokanani'scalākṣam|
tasthau puraṃdhrirapareṇa na labdhasaṃdhi-
rmāṇikyakuṇḍalamiti pravighūrṇayantī||114||
dvāri sthitā vinihitaikakavāṭapaṭṭa-
ruddhārdhavigrahatayā girikanyakāśrīḥ|
preyāṃsamaikṣata vadhūḥ stimitaikatāra-
śāreṇa yāntamaparā natapakṣmaṇākṣṇā||115||
stanaparisarabhāge dūramāvartamānāḥ
śritatanimani madhye kiṃcideva skhalantaḥ|
vavuratanunitambābhogaruddhā vadhūnāṃ
nidhuvanarasakhedacchedinaḥ prāhṇavātāḥ||116||
vighaṭitadalamudrābandhasaugandhikāna-
rnibiḍapuṭakuṭīrakroḍakārāvimuktaiḥ|
udayagatamanāvīvāruvadbhirdvirephai-
staruṇamaruṇaratnacchāyamuṣṇāṃśubimbam||117||
preṅkhatpiṅgārkadhāmacchuraṇakapiśitaścyotadacchinnanaiśa-
sthulāmbho binduvṛndāhita madhuramadhusyandasaṃdehamugdhaiḥ|
saṃrambhārabdhakolāhalamukharamukhaiḥ pattrarandhraprave"as-
prāptānandairvirejurmadhukaranikaraiḥ pūritāḥ padmakhaṇḍāḥ||118||
kurvāṇā ratnadhīnāṃ śaśadharapatanopaplaveneva tanvīṃ
toyāvasthāṃ krameṇa prakaṭitakakubhaḥ saṃbhṛtāmbhojahāsāḥ|
tanvantaḥ khaṃ kharāṃśostaruṇataratamaḥstomasaṃpiṇḍitaṃ sa-
tpratyagraṣṭhyūtalākṣārasaruciraruco dūramusrāḥ prasastruḥ||119||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākae rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye pratyūṣavarṇano nāmāṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
ekonatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
iti sphuratkisalayapāṭalārciṣi sphuṭodaye savitari saukhaśāyikāḥ|
aviskhalatsulalitabandhayā girā garīyasāṃ gurumupatasthurīśvaram||1||
vimucyatāṃ śayanatalaṃ divākaraḥ karotkarairvidalitavidrumāruṇaiḥ|
karotyasāvudayamahībhṛtaḥ kramātparisphuransphuṭamiva padmarāgatām||2||
kramādimāstava bhavaneṣu bhānumatprabhāhatāstadupalasālabhañjikāḥ|
pṛthūnmiṣaddahanakaṇotkaracchalāttamaśchidaḥ suvata ivāryamārbhakān||3||
ayaṃ kṣaṇāddayitatamena bhānunā samāgamastava bhavatīti śaṃsitum|
sphuratpadastaralitamaupasānilaiḥ kuśeśayaṃ nayanamivāmbujaśriyaḥ||4||
vivasvato vicakarūpaḥ kṣapātamaḥ sphuṭajjapākusumavipāṭalāstviṣaḥ|
vibhāntyamūrnabhasi suvarṇagairikacchaṭā ivāsitamaṇipaṭṭakuṭṭime||5||
śritodaye hatatimirotkare janā dadurdṛśo dinakṛti baddhasaṃbhramāḥ|
khavartmano mumuciṣi śītarociṣi cyutaḥ padānna bhavati gauravāspadam||6||
tatastatīrudayagatāryamāśmanāmahaskare karanikaraiḥ spṛśatyadaḥ|
piśaṅgitaṃ gaganatalaṃ vibhāvyate tadutthayā dahanaruceva saṃdhyayā||7||
dinaśriyo mukhamaruṇāruṇaprabhāpiśaṅgitasphuṭaghanamegharājikam|
virājati pratinavakuṅkumacchaṭākṛtatviṣaṃ dadhadiva pattramañjarīm||8||
apārayantyupahataśītadīdhitiprabhāmivāhimakaradhāmasaṃpadam|
nimīlitātanutaratārakādhunā vibhāvarī viśati mahīdhragahvaram||9||
nināya yadvirahavijṛmbhaṇākulo vibhāvarīṃ kathamapi sābhyupāgatā|
vilokitā dayitatamā tathā mudaṃ tanoti no rajaniviyogipattriṇaḥ||10||
yathā śaśī pipatiṣurastaparvate navāṃśumatkiraṇavirugṇacandrikaḥ|
karotyaho api nijasaṃpadaḥ sphuṭaṃ dviṣadgatā vipadadhikaṃ sukhodayam||11||
(yugalakam)
smarāturapriyatamapāṇijakṣatīrniśāgame navanihitā mṛgīdṛśām|
nayannasāvadhikamanojñarāgatāṃ navātapo nipatati gaṇḍamaṇḍale||12||
vikāsibhir diśi diśi garbhanirbharasravanmadhugrahaṇādhiyeva satvaram|
saroruhairdalapaṭalacchalānmithaḥ prasāryate 'ruṇamaṇiśuktimaṇḍalam||13||
snotyasau navakuśakoṭidaṣṭayā vibhāvarījalakaṇamālayā sthalī|
rasāyuṣāmupari bhareṇa ghūrṇatāṃ vipāṇḍuracchavikusumodgamabhramam||14||
????nairivātanutaracandrakacchalasphuṭāmarāyudhaśataśobhibhirdiśaḥ|

adhikṣapaṃ dhavalakapolamaṇḍalasphuṭoditapratimatayā mṛgīdṛśām|
???dāhitāmiva paripāṇḍuraśriyaṃ dadhatyamī tava bhavanapradīpakāḥ||16||
upeyuṣīṃ kamalarajovṛtekṣaṇo na vīkṣate rathacaraṇāhvayaḥ priyām|

prabhātajaṃ virahapariplavaṃ vadhūracintayantyanunayamagrahīnnayā|

niśīthinīvyapagamadundubisvanairvinidratāmapi sahasābhyupāgatā|
yiyāsurapyabhimatakaṇṭhagocaraṃ na kāminī ślathayati bāhupañjaram||21||
viyogajāṃ śucamasahairvyapohituṃ niketanairuṣasi niṣidhyate 'dhunā|
apāvṛtaprakaṭakavāṭasaṃpuṭasphuṭāravairgamanamivāñcitabhruvaḥ||22||
adaḥ kramādvikaṭanitambakānanadrumāntarakṣaṇaghaṭitaṃ divaḥ patat|
virājati sphuṭavihagāṇḍamaṇḍalaśriyaṃ dadhadgrahakulamastabhūbhṛtaḥ||23||
digaṅganānavakaladhautamekhalā nabhastalodadhivaḍavānalatviṣaḥ|
niśātamaḥkṣatadharavajrakoṭayo vibhāntyamūstaraṇiruco 'ruṇodgatāḥ||24||
bibhartyasau pṛthutaramaṇḍalorasā vibhāvarī dṛḍhaparirambhavibhramaiḥ|
śaśacchalācchiśirakarastadunnatastanāsitāgurunavapattramañjarīm||25||
sphuṭodayaḥ punarapi bandhaviplavaṃ purā tava vyapanayati kṣapākaraḥ|
pratīkṣatāṃ tadavadhiratra mā kṛthā manāgapi kṣapitaguruśriyaṃ śucam||26||
hataprabhe śaśini gte 'stagahvaraṃ vihāya tadvapuravatīrṇamambarāt|
iti kvaṇanmadhupamiṣeṇa lāñchanaṃ kumudvatīmiva khalu dhīrayatyadaḥ||27||
(yugalakam)
madhuspaṣṭahānibhṛtanilīnaṣaṭpadaṃ kuśeśayaṃ hṛdayamivāravandinī|
bibhartyasau tapanaviyogasaṃjvarajvalacchikhāśataśikhidāhadhūsaram||28||
acandrikāmalayajapaṅkacarcanā atārakāgaṇamaṇimekhalāguṇāḥ|
digaṅganāḥ śaśividhurā ivādhunā dadhatyamūrlulitatamaḥ kacāṃ śriyam||29||
śaśitviṣaṃ tvaritamivodarāśrayāṃ rirakṣiṣurdinakararaśmiviplavāt|
asāvitaḥ kṛtanibirīsasaṃpuṭaṃ kumudvatī racayati pattramīlanam||30||
papau tarāṃ priyatamayā samaṃ madhu pratikṣapaṃ dalaśayaneṣvaśeta yaḥ|
rasāyuṣaḥ śaśidhara tasya sāṃprataṃ samañjasaṃ saha kumudena bandhanam||31||
tathā svanmadhurasapānamattatāvicetanaḥ sarasijakukṣikoṭare|
yathā kramādaviditabandhanavyathaḥ śilīmukhaḥ sphuṭamadhunā
vibudhyate||32||
dadhadvapurvikasitaketakīrajovirūpitaṃ kumudavanādvinirgatam|

śritodayāruṇakaraṭaṅkakuṭṭanāvighaṭṭitaṃ diśi diśi dhāma bhāsuram|

samunmiṣattaraṇikarābhighātabhīpariplute śaśitimire śaśacchalāt|

sphuṭākṣatāñcitakhacitoḍuśāratāmupāgate phalaka ivāmbare 'dhunā|

mṛṇālinīdalabhidhuraṃ yathā yatā samunmiṣatyahimamarīcimaṇḍalam|

adhaścyutaṃ mama vapuṣor 'dhamityapi kṣapākṛtā bhramamabhivīkṣya bibhratā|

ito 'dhunā girigurughātaghaṭṭanāvighūrṇitārṇavajaladevateva te|
manoramāmalitatimiśritāṃ śriyaṃ bibhartyasau bhava bhavanāravindinī||39||

śilīmukhaḥ sarasijapakṣmapeśalaṃ vilambitaṃ nigaḍamivārdhavicyutam|
dadha???nmadhuvyatikaralagnamaṅghriṇā visarpati tvaritamapoḍhabandhanaḥ||41||

saraḥśriyaḥ śapharukaśobhino 'mbujātsavibhramabhramaraghaṭā vivasvatā|
ito 'dhunā śitimaṇiyaṣṭimaṇḍaliviḍambikā karanikareṇa kṛṣyate||44||
manoramasmitahasitāṃ parisravanniśajalasphuṭaruditotpalekṣaṇām|

bhujālatāmaśithilakaṇṭhavartinīṃ ratotsukā dayitatamasya kurvatī|

ratotsavapramadaviśeṣapīvare parāpnuyātkathamiva te 'tra mekhalā|

na lāghavaṃ valanavilāsavibhrame vilokitaṃ kvacana mayedṛśaṃ tanoḥ|

niśīthinīṃ samamativāhya kāminā vrajatyasāvuṣasi muhuḥ skhalantyapi|

samutthitaḥ
śayanatalātkṣamārajaśchaṭāhatobhayapṛthupārśvavigrahaḥ|

lokāntaraṃ jigamiṣoḥ śaśinaḥ pracaṇḍa-

ceto dunoti sudṛśāṃ nanu tāranāda-

karṇe kuśeśayadṛśāmupaśalyavarti-
preyoviyogaviṣamajvarakātarāṇām|
krauñcasya saṃprati girāśanidhārayeva

āpraśnapūrvamupagūḍhavataḥ priyasya
bāṣpāmbupūrapihitātanulocanāyāḥ|
cakrīkṛtau madanalāsakakāṃsyatāla-

mambhojakomalakarāṅgulikoṭibhāgaiḥ|
bimbādharānmadhurasītkṛti saṃspṛśantyaḥ
kāntāḥ prayānti dayitāntikato 'dhunaitāḥ||60||
bhrūvibhramaṃ vidadhato bahudhaivataṃ ta-
māsphālitāvikalaniḥsvanavallakīkāḥ|
gāyanti kiṃ narapuraṃdhrigaṇāḥ śaśāṅka-

prītikakubhamakuṇṭhotkaṇṭhamārāddvirephaiḥ|

vikirati makarandakṣodamuccaiḥ samīraḥ||62||
iti giramupakarṇya preyasībāhubandha-
vyatikarakṛtaratnāvāpakavyaktacihnam|
asakalaśaśimauliḥ kaṇṭhapīṭhaṃ dadhānaḥ
surabhiparimalāṅkaṃ hemapayaṅkamaujjhīt||63||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye bhagavatprabodhanaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
triṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
itthaṃ sarāgaśaśabhṛtparibhogalīlā-
vicchinnarātriraśanāmaṇikiṅkiṇībhiḥ|
nakṣatrasaṃtatiṣu saṃdadhatīṣu sāmya-
mastādrisānupadavīparipuñjitāsu||1||
viṣyandamānamadhuśikaralobhalīna-
bhṛṅgāvalīcaraṇabandhurakesareṣu|
padmākareṣu vikasatsu śanairnidāgha-
dhāmāṃśubhinnadalamaṇḍalasaṃdhibandham||2||
prātastanānilavikampitapuṇḍarīka-
pakṣmāgrakoṭighaṭite salilāśayeṣu|
nidrāvimuktivalitāvayavāpaviddha-
lakṣmīvadhūparimalaśriyi dhūlicakre||3||
śailālivatsphuṭayati sphuṭasarvabhāva-
vyaktikrameṇa divase mukharāgaśobhām|
abhyarcya kālamusalaścaraṇau mṛgāṅga-
cūḍāmaṇerudapataddhruvadhāmavīthīm||4||
(cakkalakam)
tena vyaloki divamutpatatāgravarti
vispaṣṭalakṣma pariṇāhi mṛgā"kabimbam|
unnidrakundadalapāṇḍuramaṇḍapiṇḍa-
madhyāsyamānamiva kāliyapannagena||5||
saṃpaśyati sma sa taḍitsphuraṇānubandha-
mādīrghamabhraśakalaṃ sthitamantarikṣe|
ucchvāsalakṣyarudhirāruṇakāntikaṇṭha-
cchedaṃ mahājhaṣamivāmbhasi paṅkalīnam||6||
anyonyasaṃvalanavellitapallavāgra-
viśleṣanirdalitaketuśikhāṃśukaughāḥ|
unmūlyamānaśikharaskhaladardhacandra-
ratnaprabhākhacitakāñcanatoraṇāgrāḥ||7||
ābhyāhatā viśaśarurjavamārutena
tasyāśu dikṣu surasiddhavimānasaṃghāḥ|
bāṇāgnidīpitapuratrayatāyamāna-
nānāvidhāvayavavibhramamūhivāṃsaḥ||8||
(yugalakam)
keśeṣu tasya kṛtasaṃnidhayo muhūrtaṃ
kaṃsātatāyina ivāñjananīlabhāsaḥ|
uṣṇīṣaratnakiraṇadviguṇāyamāna-
saudāmanīvalayino jaladā babhūvuḥ||9||
tasyotthitasya sahasā dhanavartmasīmni
dhatte sma karṇaśikharaṃ śriyamavyavasthām|
uṣṇīṣabhinnahṛdayastanayitnulagna-
saudāmanīvikaṭahāṭakamañjarīkam||10||
piṅgordhvalocanakṛśānuśikhāsahasra-
masyānvakāri mukhamaṇḍalamantarikṣe|
sāmbhobhareṇa gamanotthamarudvivarta-
bhājāmbuvāhaśakalena tadidvatāgre||11||
tasya pratīpamagamadgamanānilena
vikṣipyamāṇasalilā kṣaṇamantarikṣe|
mandīkṛtoṣṇakaramaṇḍalabhāsurordhva-
netrāgnitāpakṛtaśoṣabhiyeva gaṅgā||12||
vistraṃsitoḍuraśanaṃ galadindugaura-
gaṅgādukūlamakarotsa divastadānīm|
vistīrṇamambaranitambamanambudendu-
bimbānānāmburuhacumbanabaddhatṛṣṇaḥ||13||
jahre mano 'sya mṛdumārutapūryamāṇa-
randhrairhimādritaṭakīcakacakravālaiḥ|
gambhīratāramadhurakvaṇitairnayadbhi-
rutkarṇatāṃ taraṇikūbarivājipaṅktim||14||
aikṣiṣṭa visphuritakāñcanakalpavallī-
vistāripakṣmaśikharacchadacakravālam|
kailāsaśailamasakṛtsa jagattrayaika-
lakṣmyāḥ sthitaṃ dhavalavibhramapuṇḍarīkam||15||
phenāvalīdhavalacāmaracakravāla-
bhūṣābhirāmajavanasthirasaptavāhām|
bhāgīrathīṃ rathadhurāmiva dharmaraśme-
rvīkṣyaikapiṅgalagirau sa mudā vavande||16||
tena skhalatkhalakhalāmukharā karāla-
kailāsakūṭavikaṭorgighaṭāsahasrā|
saṃkrāntakaiṭabhanisūdanapādapadma-
preṅkhannakhaccavirivaikṣata jahnukanyā||17||
majjatkuberataruṇīgalitāvataṃsa-
hāsābhirāmataṭamārgamasāvapaśyat|
vistārimānasasaraḥ salilormibhaṅga-
paryastaśīkarasakāñcanavālukāmbhaḥ||18||
vīcīsamīradhutakāñcanapuṇḍarīka-
paryastakesaraparāgapiśaṅgitāmbhaḥ|
acchodamaikṣata sa devapurandhripāda-
lākṣāruṇīkṛtaśilātalatīralekham||19||
ārādhanapravaṇakāsaradaityavaṃśa-
kaṇṭhaprasādhanadhiyeva vilabhyamānāḥ|
caṇḍyā yadīyamaṇikaṃdaramandirāgra-
vistāritoraṇagatāḥ pravibhānti ghaṇṭāḥ||20||
sthūlendranīlamaṇiśṛṅgaruco 'tha tasya
kalmāṣitākhiladigantaramunmiṣantī|
bhūyastarāṃ taraṇimārgarurutsayāśu
muktāḥ śikhā iva dadarśa sa mekalādreḥ||21||
(yugalakam)
līlānimagnaśabarīkucakumbhapīṭha-
saṃkṣobhajarjaritavīcighaṭāsahasrām|
revāmasaus saralavañjulajālajambū-
stambaprasādhitataṭāmavalokya reme||22||
kaṇṭhagrahapraṇayinā dadṛśe 'tha tena
vindhyaśriyo maṇiśikhojjvalamekhalāyāḥ|
revāpagāmbupṛthupīnanitambabimba-
visrastamambaramivātanupādalagnam||23||
saṃvītatīravanarūḍhatamālakhaṇḍa-
lolānilākulitanīlajalāṃśukaśrīḥ|
tena vyaloki varuṇālayavallabhāgra-
līlābhisāraṇadhiyeva kalindakanyā||24||
sevāvicakṣaṇatayeva davāgnidagdha-
kālāgurupracuradhūmaśikhākadambaiḥ|
kurvantamaikṣata mahendramasāvanalpa-
kalpadrumāṃśukatatīḥ surabhīḥ surāṇām||25||
vispaṣṭaphenadhavalā viralormibhaṅga-
niḥsaṅgasaṃgatapayaḥplavarodhasaṃ saḥ|
lāṅgūlinīṃ saritamākalayāṃcakāra
tatpādagocaragatāmiva saurabheyīm||26||
vīkṣyāvataṃsitavikāsilavaṅgapuṣpa-
mālāḥ sa sahyagirikānanaśākhivīthīḥ|
remetarāṃ suramataṅgajagaṇḍakāṣa-
līlāvarugṇasaralonnatatālakhaṇḍāḥ||27||
utphullatīratarukhaṇḍalatāsakhibhīḥ
saṃgrathyamānanijapuṣpabharāvataṃsāḥ|
ābibhratīṃ bhramaranīlarucaḥ sa vīci-
veṇīlatāstadanu bhīmarathīmapaśyat||28||
āmagnakuntalavadhūkucakumbhabhāra-
hāraprabhādviguṇitacchaviphenahāsām|
godāvarīṃ caraṇacuñcucakoracakra-
cañcvagracumbitavilolajalāmapaśyat||29||
ullāsiśīkarakarālaphaṇāsahasra-
kallolanāgakulasaṃkulamadhyabhāgām|
veṇāṃ sphurattimiratātigabhīratālu-
mūlāṃ rasātalabhuvaḥ sadṛśīṃ dadarśa||30||
tasyopayuktataṭakānananārikela-
vallīphalaprakaraśītalagarbhatoyāḥ|
anvāyinaḥ kaṭakavartmasu pāriyātra-
śailasya cakrurupabhogasukhānnivāsān||31||
mīnāvalīsarabhasāplutighaṭṭitāmbu-
vīcī vilolaviruvatkurarī karālam|
kāveryalakṣyata jalaṃ dadhatī ca tena
niḥśaṅkaraṅkukulasaṃkulakūlakacchā||32||
āvirbhavatsmitamanoharagaṇḍabhitti-
bhāgaścamūcarapuraṃdhrigaṇaḥ salīlam|
carmaṇvatīpulinavartmani tasya hāri-
hārītakaṇṭhavirutārpitakarṇa āsīt||33||
āvāsitasya taṭavartmani tasya tāla-
khaṇḍaprakāṇḍadalatāṇḍavanapragalbhāḥ|
siprātaraṅgamaruto 'nucarāṅganānāṃ
pīnastanakṣatarujaṃ surateṣu jahnuḥ||34||
saṃvādikānanatalasya niveśalakṣmī-
madrerasāvadhikamṛkṣavato 'bhyanandat|
pādāvanau katicideva dināni baddha-
saṃstho niśīva tamasāhṛtadṛṣṭirāsīt||35||
gacchanviśaṅkaṭamasau kaṭakaṃ suvela-
śailasya kāñcanaśilāśakalāvakīrṇam|
velāvilolavaruṇālayavīcibhaṅga-
paryastavāḍavakṛśānumivaikṣatārāt||36||
tena vyalokyata kapolatalāyamāna-
vispaṣṭapākalavalīphalakandalāḍhyā|
ghrāṇānulepi navacandanakhaṇḍagandha-
hṛdyāmalā malayaparvatakānanaśrīḥ||37||
lakṣmībhṛtastribhuvanākramaṇapragalbha-
sarvonnatermalayabhūmibhṛto 'bhrasindhum|
puṇyasthitiṃ murariporiva pādamūla-
bhāgotthitāmabhinananda sa tāmraparṇīm||38||
paryastaratnakira.anaṅkuradantureṣu
velātaṭeṣu kṛtasainikasaṃniveśaḥ|
ambhonidhiṃ sa niravarṇayadullasadbhi-
ruttambhitoḍupathamūrmighaṭāsahasraiḥ||39||
unnālanīlanalavañjulanālikera-
tāmbūlavallivalayākulakūlakaccham|
āścaryadhāma dadhataṃ satataprasanna-
mapyaprasannamupapāditaśobhamambhaḥ||40||
visraṃsamānasalilāmalanīvibandha-
māsphālayantamatikāmamivormihastaiḥ|
ābaddharatnavalayojjvalakāñcidāma-
kelāṅganāpulinapīnanitambabimbam||41||
utsaṅgasa'ngivilasattaṭinīpuraṃdhri-
līlārpaṇārabhasayeva niveśayantam|
āvartacakracaṣakeṣu taraṅgahasta-
vyākṛṣṭatīratarupuṣpabharāvataṃsān||42||
preṅkhatkapālaśakalāmalaśaṅkhaśukti-
mācchāditāmbaraghanāmitavīcibāhum|
aurvāgnipiṅgalaśikhāvikarālakeśa-
mutplutya bhairavamivāsakṛdārasantam||43||
lakṣmīsurāvimalakaustubhapārijāta-
candrāmṛtāpaharaṇotthitayā śuceva|
hemādrikūṭavikaṭārciṣi nirvyapekṣa-
mātmānamaurvadahane vinipātayantam||44||
gambhīragarbhaghaṭitāspadakālakūṭa-
śeṣāgnidāhaśamanārthamiva kṣapāsu|
jyotsnāsudhāṃ vikaṭamauktikadantāpaṅkti-
śobhādharairvivṛtaśuktimukhaiḥ pibantam||45||
preṅkhatpravālakiraṇācchuritaṃ vahanta-
māvartacakraparivartagabhīramambhaḥ|
saṃvādikaustubhamayūkhaśikhāvakīrṇa-
daityāyudhavraṇakarālamurārivakṣaḥ||46||
śailābhighātaśakalīkṛtamapyakhaṇḍa-
mākṛṣṭaratnamapi ratnanidhitvamāptam|
lakṣmīmadagdhadaśamapyasamaurvavahni-
dāhākulaṃ ciragatāmapi notsṛjantam||47||
vajrābhighātabhayakātaratoyalīna-
māhendranīlamaṇiśailaśataprakāśam|
garbhāndhakāramiva śeṣaphaṇāsahasra-
māṇikyaraśmigalahastitamudgirantam||48||
preṅkhatkarālamaṇiraśmiśatābhinaddha-
kallolaketupaṭalasthagitāntarikṣam|
uddāmavājigajasadhanamabhyupetya
gṛhṇantamāśu vijigīṣumivākhilāśāḥ||49||
velā'Nganābhirabhito dhutavīcitāla-
vṛntānilākulitaphenadukūlapaṭṭam|
tābhyo diśantamasakṛjjalaveganunnā
ratnāvalīraviralāḥ sphuradindugaurīḥ||50||
utthāya dūramasakṛtsuranāthamukta-
vajrābhighātakalanāśaraṇāgatānām|
kṣoṇībhṛtāmaniśamapyakutobhayānāṃ
sarvāsu dikṣu bhayahetumivekṣamāṇam||51||
digbhyaḥ kramādaviralotkalikānubandha-
mabhyeyuṣīḥ sarabhasaṃ saritaḥ sarāgāḥ|
vispaṣṭadugdhajalakapravijṛmbhamāṇaḥ-
cetoharasthiti pariṣvajamānamārāt||52||
jyotsnātapaṃ vikaṭavīcighaṭāsahasra-
madhyāspadaṃ sapadi dugdhadhiya vivektum|
āvāñchatāṃ sarabhasaṃ taṭarājahaṃsa-
yūthena bandhuragalena niṣevyamāṇam||53||
visphūrjadaurvaśikhikālanipīyamāna-
mālokya saṅkasukamāyurivābhito 'mbhaḥ|
prāptaṃ kramādvirasatāṃ bhajamānamā'su
satkūrcakesaraghanāṃ taṭakānanorvīm||54||
aurvāgnihetiśatamapyakṛśānutāpa-
muttānamapyatigabhīratayānuyātam|
sannāgamapyanavasannagiriprakāṇḍa-
minduprabhojjhitamapi sphuṭacandrikāḍhyam||55||
dikcakravālarabhasopagatapraviṣṭa-
susvādunirjharavatījalasaṃplave 'pi|
ambhaḥśriyā virasayāprakṛterivaurva-
vahnyāravairabhidadhānamasutyajatvam||56||
gāmbhīryaśāli maṇirāgapiśaṅgamambha-
statrāpyanantabhujagādhipabhogaśayyām|
tāmāśritaṃ vikaṭakuksipuṭasthaloka-
mabhyudvahantamadhikaṃ harimeva sāram||57||
utkṣiptapañcaphaṇamaṇḍalabhogihasta-
mabhraṃkaṣolbaṇaśikhaṃ grasamānamambhaḥ|
velānilāhativighaṭṭitavīcighoṣaiḥ
saṃtarjayantamiva saṃtatamaurvavahnim||58||
āvartamaṇḍalakukundarabaddhaśobha-
kallolapīvaranitambataṭāntareṣu|
paryastaśuktinayanaṃ galadacchahāri-
ratnaprabhānivasaneṣu saridvadhūnām||59||
sannāgamakṣatatimiśritamutpravāla-
mudrāgamākulamalaṅghanatāmavāptam|
saśrīphalaspṛhataratplavagaṃ vanaugha-
muttālamuccamarasatvajuṣaṃ vahantam||60||
ullāsibhiḥ pratidiśaṃ vikaṭormibhaṅgai-
rbālāṣṭamīśaśadharapratibimbagarbhaiḥ|
uttaptahemaghaṭitāṃ parikalpayanta-
māyānapaṅktimiva toyaturaṃgamāṇām||61||
saṃsaktabindupaṭalānaviluptaśukti-
matsyaśriyo makaradantakabaddhaśobhān|
vīcīnkrameṇa dahatā bhiṣajeva śaśva-
daśvānamuktamabhito vaḍavāgninārāt||62||
sindhūrvipāṇḍurarucisphuṭaphenahāsa-
dūrāvagāḍharasanirbharamāpatantīḥ|
paśyantamādaravaśādiva nirviśeṣa-
māvartacakranayanairmadhuraṃ valadbhiḥ||63||
vicchādakāṃśumaṇivicchuritācchavīci
vicchedaśīkarasamīrataraṅgyamāṇāḥ|
vallīrdrumābhimukhamunmadanā ivātta-
kampāḥ karālitataṭopavanā vahantam||64||
udbhinnaratnakiraṇāruṇadhāturvarti-
preṅkhatphaṇāṅgulibhujaṃgamabhogahastam|
ropādivānadhigataprasaraṃ valantīḥ
sotkaṇṭhamūrmiphalakeṣu nadirlikhantam||65||
ullāsibhirdiśi diśi sphuradunmarīci-
māṇikyaraśmiśabalormighaṭāsahasraiḥ|
vistāribhirbhuvanamaṇḍalamaṇḍalapasya
vaidūryakuḍyaracanāmiva saṃdadhānam||66||
phullajjapākusumapāṭalarāgaramyaiḥ
kalmāṣitākhiladiśaṃ maṇibhiḥ sphuradbhiḥ|
velānilāhativilolaśikhāśatasya
sthūlaiḥ sphuliṅganikarairiva vāḍavāgneḥ||67||
āvartacakramudarāspadarandhranābhi-
paryantaghūrṇitamaṇiprakārāṃśuśāram|
bibhrāṇamacyutamivāñcitaśaṅkhaśobha-
mambhodamecakaruconnatavicidoṣṇā||68||
velāniloddhataśikhasya viṭaṅkaheti-
varticchaṭābhiranalasya nipetuṣībhiḥ|
ābibhrataṃ piśunitā iva kukṣibhāga-
baddhapratiṣṭhagirisānunidhānabhūmīḥ||69||
(ejatriṃśadbhiḥ kulakam)
yasyādhikaṃ dadhati irmalanīramadhya-
bimbāgatā jalabhṛto 'bhrakapaṅkanīlāḥ|
kukṣipraviṣṭakamaṭhaśvasitavyudasta-
pātālarandhragatakardamarāśilīlām||70||
velāvilāsaviśarārutaraṅgarāśi-
pāriplavīkṛtatimivrajapṛṣṭhapakṣāḥ|
yasmiñjanena niracāyiṣatodarādri-
kūṭabhramaṃ vidadhato bhramatā taṭorvyām||71||
velāpuraṃdhrirabhiyogapaṭuprapañca-
mukteva cañcalataraiḥ śriyamūrmihastaiḥ|
yasya pravālamaṇiśobhibhireti danta-
cchedaprakārasadṛśaiḥ sphuṭabindumālaiḥ||72||
devāsurabhramitamandaraśailamūla-
līlāvaloḍanavilolajalotthitasya|
mārgaṃ rasena turagādhipaterivārā-
dābhāti yatra vaḍavāmukhamīkṣamāṇam||73||
ślāghyo gavāmadhipatistimirakṣayārghya-
rūpasthitirjaladamārgatalāvalambī|
saccandrikaṃ śiśiraraśmirivātmabimba-
mambho bibharti hariṇādhyuṣitaṃ ya ekaḥ||74||
yo grāvalagrabahalormikayā cirāya
kurvāṇayā rucirasaiktayā vyavasthām|
lakṣmīṃ sabhogivalayo jalasaṃpadaiti
śailādhirājasutayeva śaśāṅkamauliḥ||75||
chāyāgatarkṣapatibimbavidhānapiṇḍa-
līlāprasāritavisāritaraṅgahastaḥ|
dhatte sma yaḥ sphuritavidrumatāmrarāga-
tālūrasatsthitiribhādhipaterabhikhyām||76||
pratyagravidrumavitānamarīcigāḍha-
rāgormilāñchitatayā rajanīṣvabhīkṣṇam|
yasyonnatānugatalakṣmaṇacittavṛtti-
rābhāti candrakiraṇollasitasya velā||77||
bhindaṃstamo bhuvanavāsagṛhe kṛtaika-
deśasthitiryamadhitiṣṭhati niṣṭhurārciḥ|
vistāripātramiva nirmalatyoyataila-
pūrṇodaraṃ vidadhadaurvaśikhipradīpaḥ||78||
lakṣmyā kulīracitayā śrita eka eva
prāpnoti yaḥ sma mahimānamalaṅghyadhāmā|
yodhairiva kṣitipatiḥ sthitimetyamanda-
pātālavāsibhiranekavidhaiśca sattvaiḥ||79||
dhatte jalāśayapatiḥ sthitimambhasāṃ sma
sārādhikastimitatāmarasāṃ ya ekaḥ|
yasyāśritena pulināñcitayā śriyā ca
vīcivrajena hariṇā ca ciraṃ vavalge||80||
(ekādaśabhiḥ kulakam)
ullaṅghya varṣagirivīcimatīśatāni
nānāvidhānyatah tadīkṣaṇabaddhatoṣaḥ|
dūrādilāvṛtamasāvavipannameru-
cchāyaṃ viḍambitahimādrimasāvapaśyat||81||
dhatte samudraparikhāvalayāvalīḍha-
paryantavartmaparimaṇḍalabhūpratiṣṭhaḥ|
yaḥ kūrmapṛṣṭhapṛthukarparasaṃniviṣṭa-
rukmāṃśuvicchuritamandaraśailaśobhām||82||
vistāraśālikuruvindaśilānitamba-
bhāgotthitaṃ vahati yaḥ karacakravālam|
skandhāvagharṣaṇavilagnamahāvarāha-
viśliṣṭakesarasaṭānikurumbaśobham||83||
yena prasādhitamilāvṛtamācakāsti
ratnaprabhāśabalakāñcanasānunoccaiḥ|
padmāsanena ca vinidrapalāśacakra-
mutpattipaṅkajamanujjhitakarṇikāṅkam||84||
yasminvibhāti śiśirāṃśukalāmṛṇāla-
vallīsanāthapṛthupuṣkarabhūmirarvāk|
stambhe hiraṇmaya iva kṣaṇadāndhakāra-
cchāyākareṇuralinīlarucirnibaddhā||85||
vistāritārkamaṇipallavaniryadagni-
dhautāgniśaucaśucikalpalatādukūlaiḥ|
viṣyandisāndrajalabindukaṇendukānta-
vallīvimardakṛtadurdinamūlabhāgaiḥ||86||
baddhāspadakṣaṇavinihnutavahnitīvra-
tāpānumeyadivasādhipamaṇḍalābhiḥ|
śākhāspadabhiraruṇāśmavitardikābhiḥ
saṃdarśitakṣayaniśāmukhasāṃdhyarāgaiḥ||87||
vajrāṅkurāhitaśatakratucāpacakra-
muktāphalastabakamañjuramañjarīkaiḥ|
ratnāṃśupiñjaritakhañjanakhañjarīkaiḥ|
mañjīramañjutaraśiñjalatānikuñjaiḥ||88||
sthūlendranīlaśakalagrathitālavāla-
madhyaprabhājanitasekajalaughaśaṅkaiḥ|
abhraṃkapāgraviṭapāspadaśātakaumbha-
kumbhīphalānumitaśevadhisaṃniveśaiḥ||89||
tasyānuvelamalivallabhavellitāgra-
vallīvilolamaṇipallavavallarīkaiḥ|
aikṣiṣṭa kalpatarubhiḥ kalilāmanalpa-
saṃkalpasādhanaphalairmaṇimekhalāṃ saḥ||90||
(navabhiḥ kulakam)
gachankramadatha vilambitaratnadāma-
dolādhirohataralīkṛtatārakaudham|
abhyunmiṣanmarakatāṃśuśikhāyamāna-
lagnārkakūbarituraṃgasaṭāvalīkam||91||
stambhaskhalajjhaṇajhaṇāraṇitābhirāma-
ghoṣānubandhisurasiddhavimānaghaṇṭam|
āśliṣṭatārakamṛgollikhitāntarikṣa
saṃdehitenduśakalasphuradardhacandram||92||
nirdhūtacāmaraśikhāśatavījitārka-
mucchrāyinākamaṇigoṣuratoraṇaṃ saḥ|
ānanditālivigalanmakarandabindu
mandāradāmakṛtabandanāmālamāpat||93||
(tilakam)
tasya śyāmāyamānasthagitadinakarākāśasaṃkāśakāya-
cchāyāpītātapāśātaṭanimitadṛśo ratnasānusthalīṣu|
pratyāsannatriyāmāmukhasaraladhiyaḥ satvaratvaṃ vibhūṣā-
vinyāsaṃ pratyavāpuḥ smararabhasarasaplāvyamānāstaruṇyaḥ||94||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye mārgavibhāgarvarṇano nāma triṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
ekatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
tārāpathātsa hṛdayasthagariṣṭhakāryaḥ
pṛṣṭhe puraṃdaragire racitapratiṣṭhaḥ|
māṇikyagopuramatītya samāsasāda
mārgāvasādarahitastridivopakaṇṭham||1||
ścyotatsudhāśiśiraśīkaraśāritābhra-
magnāmaradviradaśūtkṛtabhinnavīcim|
tatpīvarāyatakarāhatirugṇahāri-
haimāravindamakarandavimiśratoyām||2||
līlānimagnakamalāsanavāhahaṃsa-
saṃdehitācchajalaśīkaraphenapiṇḍām|
uttāralagnaharidaśvarathāśvabandha-
bhogīndragāḍhaparipītataraṅgavātām||3||
vistāriṇaḥ parisarānsphuṭahāṭakeśa-
mantrābhiyogakṛtasiddhinarendrakalpān|
ābibhratīṃ sakalaśailabilābirāma-
sīmantinījanamanoramagāḍhaśobhān||4||
saṃvādibhārakathaṃ dadhatīmalupta-
matsyāvanātanurasasthavirāṭamambhaḥ|
preṅkholanena harataṇḍavato 'dhikaṃ ca
dhautāmbarāṃ kṣaya ivormigaṇena gaṅgām||5||
snānavatīrṇadhavalagrahacakravāla-
saṃdehitendurucibudbudabinduvṛndām|
uccaiḥśravaḥkhurapuṭāhataratnapaṭṭa-
sopānapaṅktimavalokya mudā vavande||6||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam)
abhyunmiṣatkanakapaṭṭamarīcipiṅga-
mutkhātaratnabisamunmadahaṃsagālam|
mandākinītaṭamavekṣya sa nīlakaṇṭha-
mūrdhno 'smaraddhṛtakapālaśikhāmaṇīndoḥ||7||
sa preṅkhitaśravaṇatālasagīravega-
paryastakāñcanalatāspadaratnapuṣpe|
saṃdānitaṃ mahati kalpatarāvapaśya-
dairāvaṇaṃ sakalanāgakulāvataṃsam||8||
gaṇḍasthale navamadānamuci prakṛṣṭa-
śobhe mahāhavavimarda ivāsurāṇām|
baddhāspadāṃ madhulihāṃ pṛthukarṇatāla-
dolānilena lulitāṃ paṭalīṃ dadhānam||9||
dūravyapoḍhamalaśītamarīcibimba-
gauracchaviśravaṇacāmaracārubhūṣam|
ālagnabhagnavikacojjvalapārijāta-
sanmañjarīkamiva vaktratalaṃ dadhānam||10||
āghrātumanyakarimaṇḍaladānagandha-
mūrdhvīkṛtapravarapīvarahastadaṇḍam|
ālīḍhavidrumavanaprabhayeva bhinna-
mātāmrakānti pṛthu tālutalaṃ dadhānam||11||
candraprabhāpaṭalagauraśarīrakānti-
sāvarṇyanihnutamapi prakaṭaṃ vahantam|
āmantharaśravaṇatālakṛtābhighaṭṭa-
dolānubandhataralaṃ śuci karṇaśaṅkham||12||
kṣīrodasindhujaṭharātsamamutthitena
śaṅkhena karṇaśikhārāśrayiṇā salīlam|
gaṇḍasthalaṃ dadhāmunnataminduneva
sodaryatāñcitarasena vicumbyamānam||13||
helādhutivyatikarāhitagaṇḍadāna-
paṅkacchaṭāśabalitodarakundapāṇḍū|
vispaṣṭalāñchanakalaṅkaśaśāṅkabimba-
khaṇḍadvayapratikṛtī śravaṇau dadhānam||14||
saṃvartakābhrarasitānuvidhāyikaṇṭha-
garjācchalena cirasaṃbhṛtamudgirantam|
vistīrṇakarṇakuharāntaramārgalabdha-
kukṣipraveśamiva sāgaramanthaghoṣam||15||
rīḍhāvalīḍhajalamantharameghakhaṇḍa-
mutkṣiptamambaratale saralaprakāṇḍam|
hastārgalaṃ dadhatamindukarāvadāta-
muttambhitakṣititaloragabhogaśobham||16||
gaṇḍasthalīvigalitātanudānapāna-
lobhāgatairaviralaṃ bhramarairbhramadbhiḥ|
pātālagarbhasahavāsarasena gāḍha-
māliṅgyamānamiva saṃtamasaprabandhaiḥ||17||
ābaddhadehabharakāñcanabhūmipīṭha-
śoṇāśmaraśmikapiśaṃ tripadīvilāsaiḥ|
saṃdhyāṃśupāṭalitatigmamarīcibimba-
saṃvādi pādatalamaṇḍalamudvahantam||18||
nirvāsitasya ripuṇā saha devasaṃghai-
rbhartuḥ savistaranivāsadhiyeva bhūyaḥ|
karṇaprakīrṇakavipāṇḍurapakṣmapaṅkti-
lakṣeṇa paṅkaruhanālaguṇānvahantam||19||
bibhrāṇamaṅkuśamaśaṅkitaśātakumbha-
pātaṃ maruttanṛparājyamivāsanastham|
ābaddhaśobhamabhitaḥ śucināradena
tuṅgaṃ surarṣisadameva sumerupṛṣṭham||20||
tanvannavagrahakṛtaṃ kṣaṇadāvatāra-
tārāpatho 'nya iva yo 'timanoharatvam|
sāmyaṃ vibhātasamayasya bibharti bāla-
saṃdhyāhitātanuruciḥ sphuṭapuṣkaraśrīḥ||21||
śṛṅgāriṇī pṛthakaṭākṣatayā ca yasya
lakṣmyāśritātanuranujjhitaratnakakṣyā|
āyodhanāvanitalairiva bhātyaśūnya-
rūpā sadānakavalasthitibhirdvirephaiḥ||22||
paryasyataḥ sakalasaccaritānukāri
vispaṣṭasajjanavaśīkaraṇaṃ karāmbhaḥ|
yasyāsurīmiva bibharti kapolabhitti-
racchinnadānavaratāmabhirāmarūpam||23||
yaḥ kuñjarājitavapuḥ kaṭakānusāri-
rūpo rucāsamahimāhitayā kṛtaśrīḥ|
sacchārivaṃśaracitasthitinākarodhi
nīhāraśaila iva cāru bibharti pṛṣṭham||24||
kakṣyānubandharacanārucireṇa hasti-
mallena gauravapuṣā gamitena śikṣām|
vyāpāritātanukareṇa raṇāṅganeṣu
darpādaghāniṣata yena vipakṣanāgāḥ||25||
vindhyācalonnatihṛtā paripītadāna-
sindhūrmiṇā śravaṇatāladhutena gurvīm|
kumbhotthitena navadhāturajaścayena
lakṣmīmagastyamunineva ca yaḥ sma dhatte||26||
gīrvāṇavairiṣṭatanā samareṣu yaśca
śauryātirekabhṛdanuttamadorjitaśrīḥ|
dhatte 'napoḍhakaraṭasthitimanyapuṣṭa-
nārīmivāvilaruciṃ madhupāyipaṅktim||27||
śailādhirāja iva yaḥ savikāsamarda-
nānābalānugatanāgavidāridantaḥ|
viṣpandidānajalanirjharagaṇḍaśaila-
śobhī bibhartyadhikamabhrakarītyabhikhyām||28||
premāspadābhramurajasthitiravyapāya-
lakṣmīparigraharucipracalākiśobhaḥ|
yo 'bhyāgameṣu hatadundubhireti bhadra-
kālīvilāsamadharasthitasaiṃhikeyaḥ||29||
nāgādhipo 'pi dadhadaskhalitāmaśeṣa-
bhogāśayāṃ sthitimudūḍhagurukṣamo yaḥ|
tanvanvinidrakumudaśriyamapyabhīkṣṇa-
mairāvato yudhi virājati supratīkaḥ||30||
dehatviṣambararucā bhuvanāni yaśca
vyāpāripucchalatayā yudhi rocamānaḥ|
yasya triviṣṭapasadāmativallabhasya
vispaṣṭaḍiṇḍimarutāṃ sthitireti lakṣmīm||31||
paryaptadānavapuṣā danuceṣṭitena
sādṛśyamāśritavatāpyata yen līlā|
yasyāvipannayajuṣā śrutivartmaneva
lakṣmīrabhāri caritena gurorgajānām||2||
tuṅgaṃ vapuḥ sakalahāstikabhaṅgabaddha-
kakṣyo 'tināstika iva sphuṭasādhanaśrīḥ|
vistāricakramiva rāśimayaṃ bibharti
yo 'nekadhāmakarakumbhakarālaśobham||33||
(ṣaḍviṃśatyā kulakam)
ālīnaratnakamale kaladhautapaṅka-
piṅgīkṛtāmbhasi sa nākasaritpravāhe|
āmajjato maṇimṛṇālalatāsanātha-
cañcūndadarśa salileśvaravāhahaṃsān||34||
saṅgrāmabhagnabahulāsutaśaktilasgna-
ghaṇṭāsanāthapṛthupīvarakaṇṭhabhāgam|
aikṣiṣṭa kāsaramasau samavartino 'tha
mandākinīsarasakāñcanakardamāṅkam||35||
tasyānukūlakalahaṃsakalāpakeli-
kolāhalākulitakūlajalāntarāsu|
līlārasālavisādhvasasārasāsu|
sārāsu ratnasarasīṣu sasāra dṛṣṭiḥ||36||
majjatsureśataruṇīgalitāvataṃsa-
hāsābhirāmamaṇisaikatarodhaso 'sau|
nirvarṇya nirvṛtimamandarasāmavāpa
mandākinīduhitṛkā iva ratnavāpīḥ||37||
viśrāmyati sma nalinītaṭavartma vīci-
paryastaśīkarakaṇāhatahaṃsayūtham|
asādya nirdalitamauktikacūrṇareṇu-
saṃsaktasandrasikatāśiśirīkṛtaṃ saḥ||38||
mandākinītaṭataroḥ sa dadarśa manda-
vātābhighātacalitena navāṃśukena|
airāvatīyadaśanavraṇapaṭṭabandha-
mābandhuraṃ vidadhatīmiva kalpavallīm||39||
dolāyamānamaṇikuṇḍalacāruratna-
kāñcīkalāpacaraṇābharaṇābhirāmāḥ|
vispaṣṭabhedamavalokayati sma kalpa-
vallīḥ sa nākalalanāśca suvarṇagaurīḥ||40||
vistīrṇakāñcanalatāgṛhajṛmbhamāṇa-
saṃbhogadevamithunaṃ mumude vilokya|
siddhāṅganākaraviluptanavapravāla-
mandāravṛkṣamatha nandanakānanaṃ saḥ||41||
saṃcārihaṃsamithunāñcitacārupāda-
mudrāṅkaratnasikatāñcitatīralekhāḥ|
paśyannasau tadupakaṇṭhaniviṣṭahema-
vāpīrvinidrakamalāściramabhyanandat||42||
aikṣiṣṭa sa tridaśakānanasaṅgiraṅga-
dagre kuraṅgakulamākulitāntarikṣam|
ratnaprabhākhacitasūkṣmaśarīrapakṣma
tārāmṛgasya vidadhatparivāralīlām||43||
māṇikyapallavamayūkhaśikhāvalupta-
cchāyāvitānamapi tatra sa pārijātam|
sacchāyameva ca dadarśa nabhaḥpuraṃdhri-
hastāmbujāvacitakomalaratnapuṣpam||44||
vistāraśālivilasanmaṇipallavāgra-
nirgacchadacchakiraṇaprakaracchalena|
ratnālavālavalayāntaravarti pīta-
mabhyudvamantamatibhūribharādivāmbhaḥ||45||
nākāṅganāruṇatalāṅgulicakravāla-
saṃdehitābhinavapallavapāṇilūnaiḥ|
abhyunmiṣadbhirapi tatsamakālameva
lakṣmīṃ vahantamaparāpararatnapuṣpaiḥ||46||
(tilakam)
ityuttarottaraviśeṣavilokanecchā-
vismeratāmupagataḥ śaśimaulidūtaḥ|
ratnaprabhākhacitakāñcanatoraṇāgra-
vartī muhurtamabhavatpuruhūtapuryāḥ||47||
yasyāṃ bibharti maṇimandiramindranīla-
māṇikyasālavalayāntarasaṃniviṣṭam|
vistāraśālimadhusūdanabāhudaṇḍa-
mandīramadhyagatamandaraśailalīlām||48||
yasyāṃ sphuranmarakatāruṇaratnaharmya-
bhittiprabhāpaṭalasaṃvalitā vahanti|
candrāṃśavaḥ kurabakadrumapuṣpatā(nā?)la-
vṇtaśriyaṃ haritapāṭalatāmavāptāḥ||49||
vaidūryapaṭṭaghaṭitāraribhirniśāsu
dūrādapāvṛtamukhairiva dṛśyamānaiḥ|
dvārairbibharti pihitairapi yatra lakṣmī-
mabhraṃkaṣā pratidiśaṃ maṇiharmyapaṅktiḥ||50||
pratikakubhamayatnapūrvamārādupavanakalpalatāṃśukāni yasyām| surabhayati
gavākṣamārganiryatpracuratarāgurūdhūpasaurabhaśrīḥ||51||
yasyāṃ vibhāti niśi candrakarāvamṛṣṭa-
hārendukāntataralacyutamaṅganānām|
ābaddhabindupaṭalānanacandrabimba-
niryatsudhāśiśiranirjharaśobhamambhaḥ||52||
yatrendranīlavalabhīvivarābhinirya-
daṃśucchaṭāpaṭaladhūsaritānubandhām|
dhattetarāmatanumatsarasaiṃhikeya-
niṣpītamuktamalināmiva kāntiminduḥ||53||
yatradadhati surayuvatayaḥ śriyaṃ bhāsvadasitamaṇibhavanasaṃgajām|
vyūḍhasalilabharajaladamaṇḍalapre"khadaciraruciruciravibhramāḥ||54||
klāntiṃ ratāntajanitāṃ ślathayanti yatra
māṇikyamandiragavākṣapathapraviṣṭāḥ|
abhyarṇavartisuranirjhariṇītaraṅga-
bhaṅgānusāraśiśirā maruto 'ṅganānām||55||
yasyāṃ nabhaścaragaṇena vidūradeśa-
saṃsthena sālavalayaṃ kaladhautadigdham|
ālaṣyata bhramadalātaśikhākṛśānu-
lekhānibaddhapṛthucakrakarālaśobham||56||
yasyāṃ bhūtyānujjhito nīlakaṇṭhacchāyāramyo bhogināthairaśūnyaḥ|
dhatte śobhāṃ dehalīnāṃ gṛhaughaḥ kṣmābhṛtkanyāmunnatātmeva śaṃbhuḥ||57||
dīrghīkṛtāmiva vilocanayoryugeṣu
saṃpiṇḍitāmiva kapolakucasthalīṣu|
vistāritāmiva nitambataṭe bibharti
lāvaṇyakāntimabalājanatā ca yasyām||58||
candrodaye bhavanacandramaṇipraṇāla-
viṣpandamānajalanirjharasiktamūlaiḥ|
yasyāṃ śiśūpavanapādapacakravālai-
rāliṅgyate pratidiśaṃ sakalartulakṣmīḥ||59||
rāmābhirāmaśca vidūrajāśmaprāsādarāśirniśi yatra dhāmnā|
hataprasarpanmṛgarūpacihnatejasvimārīcabalaścakāsti||60||
jyotsnāchaṭādhavalaketanavaijayantī-
vyājena nirjitavicitrapurantarottham|
yā diṅmukheṣu śaśidīdhitipāṇḍu mūrta-
mālakṣyate yaśa ivāviralaṃ kirantī||61||
nibiḍamapi nibaddhānūruṇā ratnaharmya-
sthalaghaṭitaśikhaṇḍivrātakekāravārtā|
vivalitaphaṇacakraṃ yatra mārgāgatasya
ślathayati rathabandhaṃ bhāsvato bhogipaṅktiḥ||62||
ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulakam
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye svargābhogavarṇanaṃ nāmaikatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |
atha tām aviśan nīlamaṇimandirasaṃkulām |
vindhyabhūmim iva vyaktagaṇḍaśailāṃ gaṇādhipaḥ || 1 ||
padmarāgamayāṭṭālaprakāśena prathīyasā |
gaganāmbhodhigarbhaurvavahninā racitaśriyam || 2 ||
vicitrasthānakopetāḥ sukumārāṅgavartanāḥ |
nṛtte citre ca dadhatīm ākṣiptahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ || 3 ||
pauraiḥ sadāśeṣabhogabhāgbhir vaikuṇṭhavibhramam |
bibhradbhir āhitābhikhyāṃ samudragṛhakāspadaiḥ || 4 ||
dadhatīṃ madhyamagrāmamūrchanāprakriyām iva |
sakalopanatodārapauravīracitāṃ śriyam || 5 ||
pravālapāṇibhir vallīḥ pāṇipadmaiś ca yoṣitaḥ |
padmānanaiś ca nalinīr bibhratīm upaśobhitāḥ || 6 ||
aśasā(bhūyasā) talpalopāttamanoharataratviṣam |
mātaṅgapṛṣṭhavaṃśorvīm iva vistṛtadīrghikām || 7 ||
bibhradbhir geyavaidagdhīm upakaṇṭhakṛtāspadaiḥ |
tālākṣaracitābhikhyaiḥ kānanair upaśobhitām || 8 ||
sasūkṣmatilakāṃ vaktracchāyāṃ gārutmatīm iva |
giraṃ ca sāmṛtodgārāṃ dadhatīr dadhuṣīṃ striyaḥ || 9||
antaryuktān mahāmātraiḥ patadgrahaśatākulān |
niśāntāndadhatīm arkakṛtānakaluṣatviṣaḥ || 10 ||
adṛṣṭanigrahasthānāṃ prauḍhavādavidhām iva ||
sadācāryāhitacchāyāṃ nṛttalīlāviḍambinīm || 11 ||
bhinnaṃ layam iva tredhā drutamadhyavilambitam |
valibhaṅgaṃ dadhānābhiḥ kṛtaśobhāṃ puraṃdhribhiḥ || 12 ||
daśanenduprabhālokaiḥ svacchamānasanirjharaiḥ |
madanastabakodbhedaiḥ strīṇāṃ hāsair virājitām || 13 ||
naktaṃ nakṣatramālābhiḥ kṛtamūrdhavibhūṣaṇaiḥ |
alindā nākulaṃ harmya gajair bibhradbhir ācitām || 14 ||
satkāñcanaparīkṣāyāḥ sadṛśīṃ dṛṣṭihāriṇīm |
nikaṣopalasallekhām adabhrāṃ bibhratīṃ śriyam || 15 ||
śubhaprastāvanāhṛdyāṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakām |
nānārthaprakṛtiślāghyāṃ nāṭakaprakriyām iva || 16 ||
vyāptāṃ kṛtayugasthāsnusthitiṃ bhogibhir uddhataiḥ |
rathasaṃsthām ivoṣṇāṃśo rathyāvalivirājitām || 17 ||
anāptagotraskhalanām avipakṣām iva striyam |
śubhaprakṛtivistārāṃ vīṇāvādyavidhām iva || 18 ||
(aṣṭādaśabhiḥ kulakam)
sārdhacandrapatākatvaṃ dadhatas tena vīkṣitāḥ |
tasyām asaṃyutā hastā iva devagṛhāḥ puraḥ || 19 ||
vyaloki vismayavatā śubhamadhyamadarśanaḥ||
sīmantinījanas tena dadhan mādhyamikaśriyam || 20 ||
sa kāñcanojjvalās tasyāṃ visphuranmaṇibandhanāḥ |
alaṃkārāvalīr bāhulatāś caikṣata subhruvām || 21 ||
prāptānalasanāthatvaṃ tena tatra gṛhāvalī |||
paṭalopahṛtacchāyā damayantīva vīkṣitā || 22 ||
tenaikṣyata sudhāpāṇḍucchāyasanmānasālayā| |
nagaryā dadhatī sāmyaṃ krīḍākamalinī puraḥ || 23 ||
mahān apy anahaṃkāraprasūtir avalokitaḥ |
tārako'py amunā bibhral loko'nakṣigataḥ śriyam || 24 ||
vidagdhamaṇḍalīm ārād goṣṭhībandhamanoramām |
sadākṛtigaṇopetāṃ sadvṛttiṃ sa vyalokayat || 25 ||
tenāṅganājanas tasyām anapekṣitabhūṣaṇaḥ |
svarūpaśobhayākrāntaḥ śakrahasta ivekṣitaḥ || 26 ||
jaharṣa sāmānyaguṇadravyasaṃyogasusthitām |
tāṃ kaṇavratasiddhāntaprakriyām iva vīkṣya saḥ || 27 ||
saṃkrāntayāñjanacchāyadehapratimayātha saḥ |
praviśansphaṭikāgārān aindranīlān ivākarot || 28 ||
apūrvadarśanākutakutūhalavaladṛśaḥ |
ditijāstaṃ visṛṣṭānyakartavyā niravartayan || 29||
tatparijñānaśūnyena cetasāhitakautukāḥ|
papracchur maṇḍalībandhaiḥ ko'yam ity asurā mithaḥ || 30 ||
anyair vijñāyamānatvād anyasyābhiniveditām |
sa śṛṇvann ātmano'bhikhyāṃ rājamārgān alaṅghayat || 31 ||
muktāpravālavaidūryaprāyaratnapariṣkṛtāḥ |
jahau niṣadyāvīthīḥ sa sindhuvelāviḍambinīḥ || 32||
prāptavān atha daityendrasiṃhadvāraṃ vibhūtimat |
trailokyasaṃniveśasya pratyādeśam iva sthitam || 33 ||
sanāgayakṣadaiteyavasvādityamarudgaṇam |
anekāś caryasaṃdohaṃ viśvarūpam iva sthitam || 34 ||
nānāsuragaṇākīrṇaṃ purīdarpaṇabhūtale |
adṛṣṭapārasaṃsārapratibimbam ivotthitam || 35 ||
(tilakam)
vikāsikiṃśukacchāyād vanād iva vibhāvasoḥ |
tatkṣaṇāpahṛtān pattraśukān aikṣata savyathaḥ || 36 ||
candrāṃśugaurasatpaṃkṣabālabhārān pracetasaḥ |
dadarśa vāhahaṃsāṃś ca cāmarāṃś ca hṛtānasau || 37||
caturdiksphaṭikāgāraprabhākṣīrapariplutam |
dadarśa coccaiḥśravasam uttiṣṭhan tam ivodadheḥ || 38 ||
trailokyalakṣmyāḥ sa dadhallīlādolām ivāgrataḥ |
vilolamuktāprālambavyājenaikṣata toraṇam || 39 ||
dadarśa toraṇāmuktāś caṇḍīsiṃhasaṭāvalīḥ |
utpātendukalā daityapralayāśaṃsinīr iva || 40 ||
adṛśyamānaparyantān arpaṇīyakarān asau |
dadarśa vividhān rājño digvibhāgān ivāgatān || 41 ||
utkhātaśeṣamāṇikyakaṇṭhakāśūnyakaṃdharān |
rabhasāliṅgitasvaḥstrīstanavāsāvilorasaḥ || 42 ||
bhartuḥ prasādalabdhāni devayānāni satvaram |
nirgatyārohato daityarājaputrān dadarśa saḥ || 43 || (yugalakam)
athādhibhūmi vinyastakarajānubhir ādarāt |
nyavedyata dvāragataḥ sa bhartre pratihartṛbhiḥ || 44 ||
avajñācirasaṃrodhamuktayaitviti tadgirā |
nirdiśyamānamārgastaiḥ sa daityendrasado'viśat || 45 ||
bhāsvanmaṇiśirodaityabhogimaṇḍalasaṃkulam |
taddehamalinacchāyātimiraplavapūritam || 46 ||
vaidūryakuṭimacchāyajalanirbharasaṃplavam |
praviṣṭavān athaikṣiṣṭa pātālam iva tatsadaḥ || 47 || (yugmam)
tatra siṃhāsanāsīnāṃ tamālaśyāmalatviṣam |
sphuradaṃṣṭrānanāṃ mūrtiṃ kauśikīm iva bibhratam || 48 ||
kuṇḍalātaparatnāṃśubālātapavilaṅghitam |
bibhrāṇam animitte'pi roṣāruṇam ivānanam || 49 ||
cāmarādhūnanavyagrakarapaṅkajayāniśam |
niṣevyamāṇam abhitas trailokyavijayaśriyā || 50 ||
bibhrāṇaṃ śoṇamāṇikyabhūṣāṃśucchuritaṃ vapuḥ |
aśāntavajrasaṃpātavāhniśeṣam iva kvacit || 11 ||
jayakuñjaranakṣatramālām amalamauktikām |
dadhataṃ vikaṭāṃ hāralatāṃ pīnena vakṣasā || 52 ||
diṅnāgadānaviṣyandakatapattrāṅkuraśriyaḥ |
bibhrataṃ bhuvanābhogavanatālatarūn bhujān || 53 ||
keyūrāsitaratnāṃśujaladhārāś ca bibhratam |
vajrānalaśikhādāhaśāntihetor iva srutāḥ || 14 ||
uraḥsthale niṣaṇṇāyā ratnaparyaṅkavibhramam |
bibhrataṃ diggajādhīśadantabhaṅgaṃ suraśriyaḥ || 55 ||
dadarśāndhakam ābaddhamadhyaṃ kanakaśṛṅkhalaiḥ |
nitambaparivṛttārkaraśmirekham ivācalam || 16 || (navabhiḥ kulakam)
trailokyaśrīkareṇostamālānībhūtadordrumam |
vilokyeṣannataśirā vinayāt praṇanāma saḥ || 17 ||
atha bāhuṃ prasāryārād diṅnāgakarapīvaram |
ita ity asurendreṇa nirdiṣṭaṃ svayam antike || 58 ||
hemapīṭham asau citraratnajālapariṣkṛtam |
adhyāsta lokasaṃvartamegho merum ivonnatam || 59 || (yugalakam)
atha lambhitasatkāraṃ tam uvācāndhakāsuraḥ |
dantajyotsnāchalenāriyaśaḥpītam ivodgiran || 60 ||
gaurīvigrahasaṃdhānasamāsāditanirvṛteḥ |
gaṇeśa kuśalaṃ kaccid avyāhati pinākinaḥ || 61 ||
cireṇa bata kenāpi hetunā smṛtigocaram |
āgacchāma vayaṃ śaṃbhor yeneha tvāṃ vyasarjayat || 62 ||
jayalakṣmyopagūḍhasya purā jitamarutvataḥ |
na mamāṅgeṣu saṃjātas tādṛśaḥ pulakodgamaḥ || 63 ||
nirvyājaprītipiśunaḥ śaśiśekharaśāsanāt |
īyuṣi tvayi sauhārdarasasyandini yādṛśaḥ || 64 || (yugalakam)
ime vajakaṇā harṣasphuṭadvraṇamukhotthitāḥ |
romāñcodgamakārkaśyam aṅgeṣv adhikayanti me || 65 ||
saptalokādhipatyena na tathonnatim āgatāḥ |
yathāviṣkṛtasadbhāvabhavasaṃbhāvitā vayam || 66 ||
kartavyaṃ tan na paśyāmi kṛtakṛtyo'pi dhūrjaṭiḥ |
yac cetasi nidhāya tvaṃ prāhiṇodas madantikam || 67 ||
tadāvedaya saṃdeśam indumauler vivakṣitam |
kutūhali dadāty asmān mano nodāsituṃ yataḥ || 68 ||
ity ukte tena dantāṃśupuṣpitādharapallavaḥ |
avāptāvasaro vaktuṃ dūta ity upacakrame || 69 ||
kalyāṇīṃ giram utsraṣṭuṃ viralā eva jānate |
satyāṃ rekhāṃ vilikhituṃ citrakarmavido yathā || 70 ||
yad evam ādarārūḍho bahumānāspadaṃ tvayā |
kriyate kuśalapraśnas tenādya kuśalī vibhuḥ || 71 ||
yaśoṃśubhāsuracchāyaḥ kṣatadaurgatyaviṣṭhavaḥ |
vibhātyanarghaḥ saṃsārasāgaraikamaṇirbhavān || 72 ||
sārambhatve'pi satataṃ vispaṣṭaparighaṭṭanam |
tava jātaṃ dviṣaccakraṃ śuṣkaṃ geyam ivāpadam || 73 ||
tvayā naiyāyikeneva satpakṣāśrayaśālinā |
hetau vidadhatā yatnaṃ parapakṣo nirākṛtaḥ || 74 ||
uparyeva tava sthāsnu śaraccandrāṃśupāṇḍuram |
yaśaś chattram ivābhāti cchattraṃ yaśa ivojjvalam || 79 ||
vaidagdhīṃ bibhṛyuḥ śailā niḥsāritamarutvataḥ |
vajrānalaśikhājālapluṣṭapakṣāḥ kathaṃ nu te || 76 ||
sphuraty adhitaṭaṃ sindhoryāmuktākiraṇacchaṭā |
sā vaḥ saṃkocitāristrīmukhābjā kīrticandrikā || 77 ||
pluṣyaty arīn pratāpas te nirvāpayati cāparān ||
dāhātmakatvam adhikaṃ vahner aikāntikaṃ punaḥ || 78 ||
krūre'pi mārdavopetā vāmācāre'pi dakṣiṇāḥ |
pāpe'pi śuddhamatayas tvādṛśā bhuvi durlabhāḥ || 79 ||
anekajanyaśobhī tvaṃ bhartālaṃkṛtavigrahaḥ |
tvamūhithāmuktakarām asaṅgo'pi jayaśriyam || 80 ||
daśām anuguṇāṃ dagdhvā nādhāraṃ tāpayaty alam |
na snehaṃ kṣapayaty uccair vaṃśadīpo'paro bhavān || 81 ||
vyajeṣṭhā gocarātītaṃ guṇagauravato'dhikam |
agādham api dugdhābdhiṃ surāsuraviloḍitam || 82 ||
kathaṃ śaśadharādhīnavṛddhikṣayatayāniśam |
sādṛśyaṃ tava dugdhodasindhunā yaśaso bhavet || 83 ||
viralās tvādṛśā loke dordaṇḍadalitadviṣaḥ |
nirdagdhāśeṣabhuvanāḥ kiyanto vahnayaḥ kṣaye || 84 ||
svacchaṃ bimbitaniḥśeṣanītisaṃgrahasusthitam |
tvam eva mānasaṃ dhatse prajñāvibhramadarpaṇam || 85 ||
dordaṇḍadalitoddāmasaṅgrāmārātimaṇḍalaḥ |
na bibharṣi guṇottuṅgo garvam anyāsurendravat || 86 ||
guṇāṃs tava girāṃ nātho vakti tenāthavāpy alam |
sindhos taṭeṣu sikatākaṇān gaṇayitāsti kaḥ || 87 ||
iti saṃsadi vakturme citraṃ yat kṣīyate na vāk |
kva vā kāvyavikalpānāṃ guṇānāṃ ca tavāvadhiḥ || 88 ||
itthaṃ pratāpasaṃpattiparākrāntamahībhṛtaḥ |
na kulyotsādanaṃ yuktaṃ tava grīṣmaraver iva || 89 ||
evam āha vibhurmānyaṃ jagatsargasthitikrame |
niyujya druhiṇopendrāv audāsīnye'smi nirvṛtaḥ || 90 ||
surāsuracamūvaṃśasaṃtānasthitir āsadat |
kaśyapo mānasotpattisaṃmatāṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ || 91 ||
sa labdhvātmabhuvo'nujñāṃ citrasargacikīrṣayā ||
upāyatātmano yogyā vidhivaddakṣakanyakāḥ || 92 ||
danudityaditiṣvāsāmudabhūvaṃstataḥ kramāt |
dānavāś caiva daityāś ca devāś ca balaśālinaḥ || 93 ||
prātikūlikatāṃ matvā mithas teṣāṃ svayaṃbhuvā |
vāsaḥ pātālamūle ca sumerau ca vyabhajyata || 94 ||
praśāntaraṇasaṃrambhaṃ svadharmāvasthitaprajam |
tena niḥśeṣamevāsīt trailokyam anupaplavam || 95 ||
atha durvāradordaṇḍadarpakaṇḍūpratāritaḥ |
ācchinaddhāma devānāṃ hiraṇyākṣamahāsuraḥ || 96 ||
sa jaghne suraśatrūṇāṃ miṣatāṃ kroḍamūrtinā |
trailokyopāplavārakṣābaddhakakṣeṇa śauriṇā || 97 ||
ninye ca marutāṃ patyur nihatyāsuramaṇḍalam |
trailokyaśrīḥ punar līlācāmaravyagrahastatām || 98 ||
yāte kāle'tha durvāradarpakaṇḍūtidurdharaḥ ||
hiraṇyakaśipur jiṣṇos tām etya punar ācchinat || 99 ||
tadvakṣo'dadaradvajradhārādalanakarkaśam |
nṛsiṃhamūrtinakharair nakharāntair janārdanaḥ || 100 ||
ittham anyāṃś ca jagato viprakartṝn mahāsurān |
anayaddīptacakrāgnijvālāpañjarayantraṇām || 101 ||
jyotsnā candrakrameṇaiva kṣīyate vṛddhim eti ca |
śūrāṇāṃ ca raṇe kīrtir gatā na vinivartate || 102||
tadarhanty adhunā prāgvad avigrahaparigrahāḥ|
rasātalanivāsena saṃvibhāgaṃ mahāsurāḥ || 103 ||
pureva lokapālānāṃ daityānāṃ ca niratyayā |
anāviṣkṛtasaṃrambhā sthitiri astu yathāyatham || 104 ||
dhāmāny adhyūṣuṣām itthaṃ premṇā nijanijāni vaḥ |
santv āviṣkṛtavisrambhāḥ parasparagṛhāgamāḥ || 105 ||
śāsati tvayi pātālaṃ tridivaṃ ca puraṃdare |
sasurāsuracakrasya trailokyasyāstv anāmayam || 106 ||
nivartite virodhe'pi yuvayor adhunā mithaḥ |
apahastitaniḥśeṣavairaṃ prema vivardhatām || 107 ||
atisaṃgharṣataḥ sindhumandarācalayoḥ purā |
prāk kālakūṭasaṃbhāraḥ paścād amṛtam utthitam || 108 ||
iti sthite samutsṛṣṭavigrahaikarasasthiteḥ |
marutvatā samaṃ manye sakhyameva tava kṣamam || 109 ||
yasya hāralatānyāsabhāsurā phenasaṃhatiḥ |
vyāvartamānā namuceḥ kaṭhinaṃ kaṇṭham acchinat || 110 ||
yasyādyāpi dadhaty ete vajravicchinnapakṣatīḥ |
sābhrāḥ pārśvabhuvo baddhavraṇapaṭṭā ivādrayaḥ || 111 ||
yasyāntarvajradahanajvālājālam iva jvalat |
cakāra nīrasaṃ daityanārīhṛdayamaṇḍalam || 112 ||
taṃ dordaṇḍamadoddāmadaityadānavasūdanam |
vajrodbhāsikaraṃ ko vā mittraṃ na bahu manyate || 113|| (cakkalakam)
suraiḥ sahāmarākrīḍakalpavallīgṛheṣu vaḥ |
āpānagoṣṭībandhena bandhuprītir vivardhatām || 114 ||
sadānanirjhareṣv ārād gaṇḍaśaileṣu dantinām |
anāyasamukhās tāvan nipatantu śilīmukhāḥ || 115 ||
avāptanarakāsaṅgā mānubhūvanmahāsurāḥ ||
krūrāsipattrasaṃpātanirargalakadarthanām || 116 ||
suraditi(danu)sutadaityakanyakānāṃ sarabhasam āplutikelilīlayāmbhaḥ |
bhavatu kucataṭīnitambabimbaskhalanavijarjaramambarāpagāyāḥ || 117 ||
ity abhyudīrya giram ujjvaladantaratna-
niryatprabhādhavalitāṃ virarāma dūtaḥ|
tasthau taduttaraviśeṣaparīpsayā ca
daityādhipasya vadane vinidhāya dṛṣṭim || 118 ||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye dūtavyāhāro nāma dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |
trayastriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
daityādhipaḥ śrutataduktavacaḥ prapañca-
sāsūyamānasatayātha sitasmitaśrīḥ|
prastāvamantikasado bhṛgunandanasya
vaktuṃ dideśa madhuroddhṛtayā bhruvaiva||1||
abhyunmiṣatkanakaśṛṅkhalacakravāla-
raśmicchaṭāpaṭalavicchuritāṃ dadhānaḥ|
kālīṃ kalindatanayāmiva dehakānti-
mullāsitakāliyaphaṇāmaṇirāgabhinnām||2||
(yugalakam)
taccoditaḥ sa daśanaprabhayā surārī-
nandrīnmṛgāṅka iva candrikayā vilimpan|
dūtaṃ śaśāṅkaśakalābharaṇasya vākya-
mitthaṃ vimṛṣya śanakairuśanā babhāṣe||3||
āsannavartidanujendraśarīrakānti-
kalmāṣitā tanuradṛśyata tasya gaurī|
svacchātmatāsphuṭataravratapītakukṣi-
bhāgasthadhūpamaṭaleva sabhātalasthaiḥ||4||
durvāravīryakaradīkṛtaviṣṭapasya
sā yasya paśyati mukhaṃ caraṇāśrayā śrīḥ|
nūnaṃ natipravaṇadurjayalokapāla-
pālīkirīṭamaṇidarpaṇamaṇḍalīṣu||5||
ābhāti yasya namitākhiladiglatāgra-
candrātapāmalayaśaḥstabakojjvalaśrīḥ|
śauryadrumo bhuvanakānanasīmnyarāti-
sīmantinījanajaṭādṛḍhamūlabandhaḥ||6||
preṅkhatkarālakiraṇaprakarā ca yasya
hastāravindaghaṭitā karavālavallī|
baddhapratiṣṭhanadarājasutākarābja-
lobhātpatadbhramarapaṅktirivābabhāse||7||
saṃbhramya yaṃ praṇamatāṃ maṇipādapīṭha-
nirgharṣaṇādiva lalāṭataṭasthalībhyaḥ|
daityadruhāṃ guruṇi satyapi nābhimāna-
bīje 'bhyudaiyata punarbhrukuṭīlatābhiḥ||8||
śyāmībhavatyanudinaṃ ripumaṇḍalasya
yasyāhae viracito niśitāsipāṇeḥ|
ākrāntadigvalayasainikacakravāla-
nirdhūtabhūtalaparāgahateva kīrtiḥ||9||
yena vyalokiṣata saṃyati vṛtraśatru-
līlānirastakuliśāgniśikhā vilagnāḥ|
bāhudrumeṣu rucirāṅgadapadmarāga-
ratnaprabhābhramavisaṃbhramamāhaveṣu||10||
helāvinirjitaharerna puro 'bhidhātu-
masyāsti te 'tra gaṇakheṭa khaṭuṅka śaṅkā|
itthaṃ isargataralapramathaplavaṅga-
saṃsargadurlalitatāsuvacaṃ vacaḥ kim||11||
(saptabhiḥ kulakam)
prāgdarśitāsuravināśavibhīṣikeṇa
mādhuryasaṃbhṛtiviśe.ajuṣā ca paścāt|
saṃdeśadānavacasā śabalena te 'tra
cetaḥ kṛtaṃ kimapi naḥ pratipattimūḍham||12||
durlaṅghyasāragahanāsu raṇāṭavīṣu
sthāṇāvivāśu vivaśaṃ vinipatya yasmin|
cakre 'bhyupeyuṣi vivartanabhāji bhaṅgaṃ
śārṅgāyudho vighaṭamānamanoratho 'bhūt||13||
anyaḥ sa eṣa bhujavajradṛḍhābhighāta-
niṣpiṣṭaśātravakulācalacakravālaḥ|
yenojjhitā yudhi dayāmṛdunātinamrā
yāthārthyamāpuramarāḥ prathitasya nāmnaḥ||14||
asyārivaṃśadāhanānuguṇapratāpa-
cchāyaikadeśalavaleśamapūrayiṣyat|
dhāmādhipo jagati yadyabhaviṣyadeṣa
na tvaṣṭṭaṭaṅkavinikuṭṭanaghaṭṭitaujāḥ||15||
vaktraṃ yathā smitavikāsikapolabhitti
dhatte na vakti ca yathā sphuṭameṣa kiṃcit|
manye bhaviṣyati tathā suracakravāla-
dāvānalaḥ sphuritahetiśikhāsahasraḥ||16||
dūre 'stu tāvadathavaiṣa surendralakṣmī-
masyānugeṣvapi mahatsu harirna labdhā|
pattrairapi kṣitiruhaḥ pratibaddhavṛtti-
rāsādayatyavanimuṣṇakarātapaḥ kim||17||
adhyāsitāṃ puramimāmasuronnatena
saṃbibhrataḥ prathitamānaparigrahatvam|
na hrepayanti danusūnubhaṭānpragalbha-
mete kimarkakiraṇā api laṅghayantaḥ||18||
chāyāvibhaṅgakaluṣaḥ kriyate yadindu-
ruṣṇatviṣānudivasaṃ pratikāraśūnyaḥ|
nirdahyate jalanidhirvaḍavāgninā ca
tajjāḍyajṛmbhitamavaimi tayorvigarhyam||19||
kāmaṃ bhavanti śataśo jagatīha kulyā-
stulyānubhāvabalatā kuta eva teṣām|
āliṅgyate tadatiriktaguṇodayaśrī-
ryatsaṃpadā tadapi vācyapadaṃ jaḍānām||20||
kālakramādadhigatodayamekato 'pi
bījāṅkurātsapadi yātamadhīmukhatvam|
vallīkulāya kimasūyati mūlajāla-
mūrdhavakāśaracitasthitaye tarūṇām||21||
pātālamandiratale kimivātra kṛtya-
manyairvyatītagaṇanaiḥ phaṇināṃ śirobhiḥ|
ślāghyaṃ tadekamapi śeṣaphaṇāsahasra-
mūrvīṃ bibharti yadaśeṣagirīndragurvīm||22||
viṣpandaśītarucinirjharavāridhauta-
dikkāḥ sahasragaṇanā nanu santi śailāḥ|
kṣmāpīṭhadhāraṇasahāḥ katicittu nūna-
mavyāhatasthitikulavyapadeśayogyāḥ||23||
daityādhipaḥ smitamukho visasarja sorja-
māvarjito 'ti dayayā yudhi jīvato yān|
rūḍhatrayā vada rasātalatāluvāsa-
marhanti te kimamarāḥ kimathāsurendrāḥ||24||
ityūjcuṣi tridaśavairigurāvamarṣa-
garbhaṃ vidhūnitaśirāstripurāridūtaḥ|
tuṅgābhimānagirinirjharajhāṃkṛtena
vākyena pūritasabhāgṛhamityavocat||25||
kiṃ kathyate balavatī bhavitavyatātra
śocyaṃ sabhātalamidaṃ danujādhipasya|
yasyāsi vatsarasahasranipītagāḍha-
dhūmāndhakāritamatirgurutāmupāsthāḥ||26||
mā bhūtparasparavirodhisurāsuraugha-
saṃmardaduḥsthitamidaṃ jagadapyaśeṣam|
uktaṃ mayeti yadanujjhitakṛtyavastu
tadbāliśena bhavatāparathā gṛhītam||27||
sarvatra vastu vitathapratibhāsameva
niḥsaṃśayaṃ bhavati viplavamandadṛṣṭeḥ|
mandākinīsalilamindumarīcigaura-
mutprekṣyate kṣatajamityaniśaṃ piśācaiḥ||28||
abhyudvahandhavalatāmapi śītaraśmi-
śobhādharāmahitapakṣagataḥ surāreḥ|
atyantavakrahṛdayo raṇarāgameva
śaṃsanvirājasi na śaṅkha iva tvamittham||29||
nindyānapi stuvata eva guṇānubhāva-
vandhyānadhikṣipata eva vimūḍhavṛtteḥ|
duḥsvāminastanubhṛtāmatidainyabhājaṃ
bhāvānuvṛttirasikāmanujīvitāṃ dhika||30||
saṃpratyamī budhajanasya na cittavṛtti-
māhlādayanti bhavato 'bhihataprakāśāḥ|
adyāpi kukṣikuharāspadapītadhūma-
śyāmīkṛtā iva bhṛgūdvaha vāci varṇāḥ||31||
antardadhatkaluṣatāmapi jihmavṛtti-
rāviṣkaroti guṇameva bahiḥ prakāmam|
kukṣipraviṣṭaviṣasaṃhatiruttamāṅga-
ratnaprakāśamiva gūḍhapado vimūḍhaḥ||32||
vyaktaṃ samāśrayavaśādiha tatsvarūpa-
śūnyo 'pi tatprakṛtitāṃ bhajate jano 'yam|
śvāsānilaḥ saralatāmupayāti veṇau
śaṅkhodare kuṭilatā punarasya siddhā||33||
yasyātatāyihṛdayāni nadanbibheda
niḥśvāsavātamukharīkṛtarandhramārgaḥ|
saṃkrāntakukṣikuharāspadasaptasindhu-
saṃghaṭṭaghorataraghoṣa ivāśu śaṅkhaḥ||34||
preṅkhatkarāṅguliśikhāgravivṛttivega-
vātāhatā jalabhṛtaḥ kakubhāṃ mukheṣu|
cakrasya yasya kiraṇaiśchuritāḥ karāla-
dhārānikṛttadinakhaṇḍaruco nipetuḥ||35||
līlā harerabhṛta yasya kaṭhorakopa-
huṃkārapāvakaśikhā vadanātskhalantī|
niḥśvāsadhūtahṛdayāspadagūḍhanābhi-
padmocchvasatkapiśakesaradhūlilīlām||36||
yasya sthitaṃ karahatastanapṛṣṭhasīma-
sīmantinīruditaśabdakṛtānubandhaiḥ|
adyāpi pallavitapūritapāñcajanya-
śaṅkhasvanairiva mahāsuragehagarbhaiḥ||37||
tasyādhipāṇi surayauvatavaktrapadma-
vispaṣṭahāsaghaṭanācaturārkabimbam|
draṣṭāsi kaiṭabhariporasurendrakaṇṭha-
pīṭheṣu cakramacirātparivartamānam||38||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam)
nāpnoti yasya yudhi dānavahetighāta-
mūrcchāndhakārapaṭalaṃ hṛdaye 'vakāśam|
grāsīkṛtoragasahasraphaṇapratiṣṭha-
māṇikyaraśmibhiriva pravilupyamānam||39||
ucchvāsikāñcanapatattrasamīravega-
visraṃsitaṃ nabhasi śītamarīcibimbam|
yenāṇḍakhaṇḍa iti nirdudhuve 'ṅgalagna-
mākampitatribhuvanaṃ bhramatāhaveṣu||40||
adyāpi pakṣapavano bhramatīha yasya
pātālavartmani javena viceruṣaḥ prāk|
vaidhavyaviklavabhujaṅgavadhūsahasra-
sāsrānubandhaguruniḥśvasitāpadeśāt||41||
pratyagrasaurabhabharākulitadvirepha-
mālāhaṭhāhṛtasudhārasaśīkarārdrāḥ|
bibhratsudhautakaladhautapatattrapaṅktī-
rjvālāvalīriva sadhūmaśikhāḥ kṛśānuḥ||42||
tārkṣyo yudhi svakaralūnapatattramukti-
saṃmānitasphuradamoghanipātavajraḥ|
nīlābhrakacchavimuṣaḥ kusṛtipragalbhā-
nekaḥkṣaṇātsa dalayiṣyati bhogino vaḥ||43||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam)
niḥśeṣalokaparivartavinodadakṣa-
dakṣārirūkṣatarasā gaṇasenayaite|
yāsyanti kāmapi daśāmasurā virugṇāḥ
saṃhāramārutaparamparayeva śailāḥ||44||
diksyandinīṣu suravāraṇadānapaṅka-
śyāmīkṛtātapajalāsu vipannapakṣāḥ|
mattā mahāsurajhaṣāḥ paridṛṣṭakaṇṭha-
cchedā bhavanti na cireṇa samucchvasantaḥ||45||
tiṣṭhantu tāvadatha vākhilasaptaloka-
saṃcāracāturajuṣaḥ pramathādhināthāḥ|
dordaṇḍayantraparivartitaratnasānuḥ
pātālavāsmahameva karomi kiṃ vaḥ||46||
iti kathayati rūkṣālāpagarbhaṃ gaṇendre
dititanayapatīnāṃ krodhasaṃrambhahetoḥ|
karatalahataratnastambhapaṅktiḥ sabhā sā-
vamaragiritaṭīvoddhūtakalpadrumāsīt||47||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye bhārgavanirbhartsanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśaḥ sargaḥ||
catustriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
krodho 'tha tāṃ timiraviplavamandadṛṣṭi-
rābaddhavepathuratikramayogavṛddhaḥ|
ābaddhamūrdhavidhutiḥ śvasitānubandha-
pāriplavādharadalaḥ śanakairavikṣat||1||
abhyāpatannuśanasāsuracakravāla-
huṃkāradhūmanikaro dadṛśe purastāt|
āliṅgitākhilavapurvratakāryapāna-
paryāptasaṃstavavaśādiva dhūmitārkaḥ||2||
vakṣaḥsthalīmalanasaṃbhriyamāṇadhūma-
lekhāvalīśabalitāṃ kupito 'gnidaṃṣṭraḥ|
ālagnapīnadayitākucakumbhapīṭha-
kālāguruprakarapatralatāmivohe||3||
saṅgrāmadohadarasasphuṭitai rarāja
pīnaṃ hiraṇyakaśipostanayasya vakṣaḥ|
sthūlāsthiśṛṅkhalanipātavirugṇakhaṇḍa-
dhārārajaḥkaluṣitakṣatajairvraṇaughaiḥ||4||
krodhānmayenaracitā bhrukuṭiḥ kirīṭa-
māṇikyaraśmikapiśaśramavāribinduḥ|
saṃhārakālarajanīva rarāja sāṃdhya-
rāgachaṭāruṇitatārakamaṇḍalaśrīḥ||5||
karṇāvataṃsavikacotpalakāntibhinna-
saṃrambhapāṭalakapolataloṃ 'sakūṭam|
rākāpradoṣa iva rāhupariplutendu-
bimbaḥ kareṇa śatadundubirāhatoccaiḥ||6||
svedāmbuśīkarakaṇaprakarāvakīrṇa-
vakṣaḥsthalavraṇadarīkuharo vikumbhaḥ|
dadhre vibhinnakarikumbhamṛgārihasta-
visrastamauktikaguhāgṛhaśailalīlām||7||
sotsekamatsaradhiyo 'nalatārakasya
niṣpeturāhavarasasphuṭitavraṇebhyaḥ|
vakṣaḥsthalīvikaṭavaprataṭābhighāta-
bhagnāmaradviradarājaviṣāṇakhaṇḍāḥ||8||
saṃrambhabhāsuraruco harikaṃdharasya
vaktreṇa saṃbhṛtarūṣaḥ sphuṭahāsabhāsā|
udgīrṇadagdhasalilārṇavabhasmadhūli-
saṃtānavāḍavamukhānukṛtirvidadhre||9||
ātāmradṛṣṭikiraṇacchuritācchadharma-
vāricchaṭākaṇaphaṇāmaṇirullasantī|
chāyākalindatanayājalajālamadhya-
magnā kalerbhrukuṭikāliyamūrtirāsīt||10||
rāhoralakṣyata mukhaṃ dṛḍhadantayantra-
niṣpeṣadhūmamalinīkṛtatālumūlam|
daityādhipaiḥ kavalitendukalaṅkapaṅka-
saṃsargadhūsaramiva pravijṛmbhamāṇam||11||
siṃhīsuto daśanapaṭṭavighaṭṭanottha-
dhūmacchaṭā bhujaganāyakabhogadīrghāḥ|
grāsīkṛtasya śaśalakṣmabhṛtaḥ kalaṅka-
lekhā ivodagiradantaritāntarikṣāḥ||12||
niṣṭhyūtayā kavalitāmṛtadhārayeva
vaktrāntarālabhuvi bhūribharādamāntyā|
tasyātiniṣṭhuraruṣo vikaṭāṭṭahāsa-
bhāsavabhāsitasabhābhavanaṃ babhāse||13||
svedāmbukardamitacūrṇitatārahāra-
dhūlicchaṭādhavalitātanurinduketoḥ|
vinyastacandanaraseva rarāja vairi-
lakṣmīsamāgamasamutsukamānasasya||14||
jṛmbhāvikāsigurumatsaradurnirīkṣya-
mātāmrabhānanamarājata vajrabāhoḥ|
autpātikaṃ vikaṭarandhraniruddhamadhya-
mudraśmimaṇḍalamiva sphuṭamuṣṇadhāmnaḥ||15||
kālāntakasya sakalārikulakṣayāya
dhūmacchaṭā malayato 'tha lalātapaṭṭam|
puṣpāvataṃsavigalanmakarandabindu-
pānārthinī madhupapaṅktiriva nyapaptat||16||
roṣāruṇekṣaṇamarīcivilaṅghyamāna-
kāloragādriśikharaśriyam āsasāda||17||
abhyunmiṣacchikhiśikhāpaṭalaṃ subāhu-
ranyonyabāhumalanena karadvayastham|
tvaṣṭā viṭaṅkataraṭaṅkanikuṭṭanottha-
mādhatta cakraghaṭanārthamivārkatejaḥ||18||
saṃrambhiṇaḥ kṣitisutasya kaṭhorakopa-
rāgāruṇacchavi vilokya vapustadānīm|
daityādhipāḥ kṣaṇamaśaṅkiṣatānapoḍha-
gāḍhorugarbhaśayanakṣatajacchaṭārdram||19||
ṭāṃkārayanvikaṭakuṭṭimapaṭṭapṛṣṭha-
maṅguṣṭhakoṭidṛḍhaṭaṅkakaṭhoraghātaiḥ|
naṣṭāṣ.adiktaṭatamaśchaṭamaṭṭahāsa-
maṭṭālakūṭabhiduraṃ vyadhitāgnidaṃṣṭraḥ||20||
cakre 'tigāḍhakarapiṣṭakarālahāra-
tārāvalīvilulitātanuccurṇapūrṇam|
vajravraṇaughamavacūrṇanakāmyayeva
saṃrambhagarbharabhasasphuṭitaṃ vidarbhaḥ||21||
kṣmāmaṇḍalaṃ bibhidivāngurupārṣṇighāta-
pātena kopakaluṣo 'tha hiraṇyanemiḥ|
cakre rasātalamadṛṣṭacarārkabimba-
saṃdarśanākulakutūhalikādraveyam||22||
vispaṣṭajihmataraceṣṭitacittavṛtti-
rutsṛṣṭasādhucaritapratipattiduṣṭaḥ|
krodhaḥ kṣaṇādavinayaikaraso 'bhyasūyāṃ
kurvanmṛgāṅkamukuṭe narakaṃ jagāhe||23||
vakṣaḥsthalīlulitahāramṛṇāladaṇḍa-
khaṇḍaḥ prakopamahiṣeṇa vigāhyamānaḥ|
chāyājalaughakalilaḥ kaluṣākulaśrī-
ruddāmavepathurathelvalapalvalo 'bhūt||24||
saṃvartakasya karavajraśikhānipāta-
piṣṭāṅgadāṃsaśikharotthitadhūmaketuḥ|
cāmīkarotthamaparaṃ bibharāṃcakāra
keyūrabandhamiva saṃsadi bāhudaṇḍaḥ||25||
daṣṭauṣṭhapṛṣṭhavikaṭabhrukuṭīkarāla-
tāmrānanasya karasaṃpuṭapeṣajanmā|
antaḥsthaśeṣaphaṇaratnanidhānabhūmi-
pīṭhe papāta śarabhasya kṛśānuvartiḥ||26||
saṃhāramārutadhutapralayāgniheti-
tālūracakraparimaṇḍalacakṣupoccaiḥ|
vindhyāsureṇa bhayakātaradaityadṛṣṭāṃ
caṇḍīṃ ruṣaṃ dhṛtavatā paruṣaṃ jagarje||27||
pādābhighātadalitaṃ kṣitipīṭhabandha-
magre 'nusaṃdhirabhasādiva kālacakraḥ|
cakre 'tigāḍhakarasaṃpuṭapiṣṭahāra-
tārāvalīlulitadhūlikaṇāvakīrṇam||28||
abhyuttatāma karatāmarasāvamṛṣṭa-
timyallalāṭaphalako 'stamayāya śatroḥ|
ātāmradṛṣṭiratimatsaratastamāla-
nīlacchaviḥ kṛtatamītimiro 'timāyaḥ||29||
svedodabinduśabaloṣmavilīnamauli-
viṣpandihemarasamiśratayā lalāṭe|
bhrūbhedarājirajitasya rarāja kopa-
līlāpuraṃdhricaṭulātilakāyamāna||30||
preṅkhannakhāṃśuparikalpitakaṇṭhadāma-
durdarśanaḥ parimamarśa kareṇa kopāt|
vajrābhighātavikaṭavraṇabaddhasaṃstha-
vicchinnahārakaṇakarburakānti vakṣaḥ||31||
dikcakravālamanaghasmaraghasmarendu-
maulīkṣaṇasmaraṇasaṃbhṛtasaṃbhramārdram|
krodhāgnidīprataratārakatārakākṣa-
kākṣekṣitaṃ na kathamapyaśanairadhākṣīt||32||
jṛmbhāvikāsimukhakaṃdaradṛśyamāna-
jihvālataḥ sapadi vihvalayansurārīn|
āvartagahvaraparisphuritapravāla-
vallīkarālajaladhiśriyam āpa dhundhuḥ||33||
vajraprabheṇa vikaṭāduraso vilūya
muktāphalastabakadāma vikīrṇamūdhvam|
āsannadeśaracitasthitiśītaraśmi-
tārāpuraṃdhriparivāravilāsamāpat||34||
krodhoddhatabhrukuṭibandhakabandhavaktra-
cchāyāndhakāravisaraprasaropaghātam|
cakruḥ karāladaśanāṃśuśikhāsahasra-
śobhābhṛtaḥ sapadi ketumato 'ṭṭahāsāḥ||35||
vajrānalo 'pyanalabhāsuraghoradṛṣṭi-
pātairdahanniva jagadgurumatsaraśrīḥ|
smeraḥ savibhramamabibhramadudgatāṃśu-
cakrāhitārkaparidhiṃ karapadmaśākhām||36||
tena krudhā dudhuvuṣoddhatamuttamāṅga-
mullāsibhiḥ kanakamaulimarīcicakraḥ|
dṛṣṭavyudastaraviraśmiriva vyadhāyi
saṃbhrāntakhecaragaṇā divasasya lakṣmīḥ||37||
saṃbhremuṣā suragaṇena vilokito 'tha
jīmutaketurabhinanditasaṃprahāraḥ|
hārānsalīlamalunāttaruṇārkabimba-
durdarśalocananipītatadātapaśrīḥ||38||
mūko 'pi bhrukuṭitaraṅgitaṃ lalāṭaṃ bibhrāṇaḥ karatalatāḍitāṃsakūṭaḥ|
saṃrambhasphuradaruṇekṣamo jagarja krodhāndho badhiritasaptalokamuccaiḥ||39||
vivartitādharavikasatkapolabhūrvicintitāhitaraṇalābhaharṣulaḥ|
vikoṣitobhayapuṭaphullatārakāmamarṣaṇo dṛśamanimeṣiṇīṃ dadhau||40||
visrabdhamaicchadavasāditavāsavoṃ 'sa-
visraṃsamānavasanaḥ savasāvaseke|
vyaṃsāsuraściramavisrasavisrutāsra-
visrāvanāvasikaraḥ samare visartum||41||
prahrādo vikaṭaviṭaṅkadaṃṣṭramāsyaṃ bibhrāṇaḥ karatalatāḍitāṃsakūṭaḥ|
digbhittipratiphalitāṭṭahāsabhāsā saṃhāre hara iva dattasaṃbhramo 'bhūt||42||
diksundarīsphuṭanavāṃśukamindugaura-
mānandanirbharamivāriyaśaḥ pipāsuḥ|
vyādādamandamatha kaṃdarakalpamāsya-
mātāmratālu śatadundubhirāttajṛmbham||43||
pādāghātairdānavacakrasya tadānīmāpātālaṃ dṛṣṭagabhīrātanurandhrā|
sāsūyasya krodhavaśādindukirīṭe pusphoṭa kṣmā rauravapātārthamivārāt||44||
siṃhāsanādasahanaḥ sahasojjhihāsu-
rutsāhasāhasarasena sahasramāyaḥ|
haṃsāṃsahārihasitaḥ sahasārihiṃsā-
sajjāhavo yudhi jaharṣa jahāsa coccaiḥ||45||
saṃrambhaghoratarahuṃkṛtidhūmaketu-
hetisphuliṅganikarairaśaniprabhasya|
pratyūyire sapadi hāralatā muhūrta-
mātāmraratnikarairiva dānavānām||46||
kṛtabhuvanavināśāśaṅkahuṃkāragarbhāḥ
sapadi paruṣaroṣaviṣkṛteḥ sūciromṇaḥ|
madhukarakulanīlacchāyatastārakāgrā-
jjalabhṛta iva vidyunniṣpapātojjvalārciḥ||47||
gīrvāṇarājapṛtanāḥ savicittavīrya-
sārastadāhavanirargalacittavṛttiḥ|
nācintayatkurucamūriva pāṇḍusūnu-
ruccāvacāstracaturo yudhi vipracittiḥ||48||
kulagirigarimasthānalpakāyo 'timāyaḥ
karakuliśatalenāsphālayanbhūtadhātrīm|
gurutarabharatāmyaddiggajaskandhapīṭhī-
luṭhitavidhurasaṃsthārugṇabandhāṃ cakāra||49||
cakṣmāyire kṣitibhṛtaḥ karapiṣṭahāra-
muktāśilāśakalakarkaśaśarkarābhiḥ|
abhyāhatāḥ kṣaya ivāsuracakravāla-
niḥśvāsadurdharasamīraparamparābiḥ||50||
saṃkṣobhavibhramaviśīrṇavikīrṇahāra-
muktāphalācchakarakākaṇacakravālam|
abhyutpatadditisutastanayitnucakra-
mākrāntakṛtsnabhuvanatritayaṃ tadāsīt||51||
karatalamalanotthaṃ mantharībhūtabhānu-
prabhamanalamanalpajvālamālākarālam|
sakalamamaravaṃśaṃ dagdhumutpādayantu
kṣayataraṇidurīkṣyaścukṣubhe kāñcanākṣaḥ||52||
bibhratyudarataramānasadṛśyamūka-
śailakṣamārabhasalaṅghanadurdharatvam|
mattā valīmukhavarūthavatīva dṛṣṭa
daityādhirājagurumatsaravikrīyāsīt||53||
teṣāmarociṣata cūrṇitapadmarāga-
ratnāṅgadaprakarapāṭaladhūlidigdhāḥ|
spaṣṭāṭṭahāsacalitātanusaṃdhibandha-
viṣyandisāndrarudhirā iva digvibhāgāḥ||54||
kalmāṣitāmbaratalāḥ pralayāvatāra-
śaṅkākulīkṛtajagattrayadṛśyamānāḥ|
ulkālatā vavṛṣire vṛṣarājaketu-
saṃrambhabhāurasurāhitadṛṣṭipātaiḥ||55||
viṣyandamānaparipītavipakṣakhaḍga-
dhārānipātasalilā iva dānavānām|
svdāmbuśīkaramuco vibabhurviśāla-
vakṣaḥsthalīṣu vikaṭavraṇakaṃdaraughāḥ||56||
āsannasaṃyugatayā sumanībabhūvu-
ruccaistarāṃ jahasurāhasatāṃsakūṭān|
hārāṃśca cakṣudurudasthurathāsanebhyo
mṛtyorapi kṣabhiyo na śaśaṅkire 'nye||57||
sabrahmadhūrjaṭiharīṃstridaśāṃstṛṇāya
vispaṣṭamatsaradhiyo yudhi manyamānāḥ|
daityādhipāścakamire kamalāsanāṇḍa-
mutplutya pāṭayitumutkaṭaroṣarūkṣāḥ||58||
tai rāhukopajanitapratipakṣapakṣa-
saṃhārabhītibirapākṛtadhairyabandhaiḥ|
āsthānyasau surariporbibharāṃcakāra
durdharṣatāṃ yadupateriva vṛṣṇisainyaiḥ||59||
itthaṃ ruṣendhanavinākṛtamapyadhūma-
mūrdhvekṣaṇaṃ smarariporiva dagdhakāmam|
jajvāla dānavasadaḥ pralayārkabimba-
durdarśaghoraghaṭitānalatārakaṃ tat||60||
vidadhruvasare 'tra daityacakrapralayaparisphuṭapaiśunotthitāni|
sakalabhuvanamaṇḍale 'pyasaktaṃ bhayamanimittaśatāni dāruṇāni||61||
pratidinamapavargadvārarandhrādamandaṃ
dinakṛta iva bimbādargalādīrghadaṇḍāḥ|
pratikakubhakalkāḥ peturulkāḥ kṣayāgne-
rbhuvanadahanahelāsūtrapātāyamānāḥ||62||
tvaṣṭṭaṭaṅkaghaṭanānikuṭṭitagrāvasāravikaṭāsthisaṃbhavam|
dhūmarāśimiva bhānumaṇḍale lagnamaikṣata kabandhamāsuram||63||
nirgacchanrajanikarasya bimbamadhyādutpātaprasaravaśna dhūmadaṇḍaḥ|
vaidagdhīṃ kuvalayadāmanīlabhāsaḥ khaḍgasya vyadhita vilagnadattamuṣṭeḥ||64||
utpātadhumamalinairnijakopacakra-
garbhacyutaiḥ pariṇatiṃ samupeyivadbhiḥ|
akīryatāśu kamalāsanapuṇḍarīka-
bījairivāmbaratalaṃ grahacakravālaiḥ||65||
abhimukhapatināśāśaṅkayeva pradīptaṃ
viviśuranalamāśā dāhayuktyā tadānīm|
sphuritavikaṭaketuvyāptadikcakravālaṃ
gaganamapi bhaviṣyatsaṃyugacchāyamāsīt||66||
kṣubhitaviṣamaveloddāmaratnākarāṇi
k.ayataruṇiruco nājīgaṇaṃstāni daityāḥ|
pratikakubhamakāṇḍoḍḍāmarākhaṇḍalaśrī-
haraṇarabhasakaṇḍūcaṇḍadordaṇḍakhaṇḍāḥ||67||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye andhakārasurabhākṣobho nāma catustriṃśaḥ sargaḥ||
pañcatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ
ityahitatribhuvanakṣayasaṃbhramārti
dikcakravālagaganakṣitigocareṣu|
utpātaviplavaśateṣu samudbhavatsu
tasminkṣaṇe pralayaśaṃsiṣu dānavānām||1||
saṃrambhagarbhauruniḥśvasitānilottha-
dhūmacchaṭābhirasurādhipamaṇḍaleṣu|
medhāvalībhirabhitaḥ sthagayatsu loka-
saṃvartadurdinamukheṣviva digvibhāgan||2||
daṣṭauṣṭhapaṭṭavikaṭabhrukuṭīvibhaṅga-
māveganirdhutaśiraḥ smaravairidūtam|
paśyatsu jihmamanalolbaṇadṛṣṭipāta-
pluṣṭaprakīrṇakaśikhaṃ ditijādhipeṣu||3||
antaḥprakopadahanoddhatahetidāha-
bhītyeva kaṇṭhavikacotpalamālikāsu|
vakṣaḥsthalīnikaṣaṇotthakṛśānudhūma-
vyājātpalāyanaparāyaṇatāṃ gateṣu||4||
adyaiva te 'stu nidhanaṃ sadasītyaśakla-
kliṣṭākṣaraṃ nigadataḥ kramayogaśūnyam|
saṃtarjayatsu taralīkṛtatarjanīka-
mitthaṃ gaṇādhipatimāhavadurmadeṣu||5||
saṃrambhagāḍhavalitāṅgulipallavāgra-
murdgūrya muṣṭimapareṣu ruṣabhihantum|
utthāya daṣṭavikaṭauṣṭhamavadhyadūta-
buddhdyā śanairupaviśatsu nijāsaneṣu||6||
anyeṣu dhīralalitasthiti kṛtyavastu-
cintāpraveśavivaśīkṛtaśemuṣīkam|
saṃrambhaśūnyamamarāriṣu nistaraṅga-
bhaṅgormimālisadṛśīṃ śriyam āśriteṣu||7||
premānubandhiparimārjanalagnarāja-
lakṣmīdukūlapaṭallavavibhramābhiḥ|
vibhrājitena nakhadīdhitimañjarībhi-
rākramya pādaphalakaṃ caraṇena haimam||8||
cetoharasmitavikāsikapolabhitti-
bhrūkṣepalolalalitāṅgulihastaceṣṭam|
candrāṃśugaurarucikalpalatādukūla-
paryaṅkabandhavikaṭonnatapīnavakṣāḥ||9||
daityādhipo mukharitākhiladiṅmukhena
vākyena dānavacamūpatikarṇakukṣīn|
āpūrayanpralayamegha ivādrirandhra-
bhāgānviśeṣasparuṣākṣaramityavādīt||10||
(daśabhiḥ kulakam)
kiṃ sāṃprataṃ taraladūtavacaḥprapañcai-
rebhiḥ kilākulitasattvadhiyaḥ stha daityāḥ|
saṃbhāvyate śikhariṇāṃ nahi mugdhapattri-
śabdaśrutikṣubhitakesarikaṃdaratvam||11||
etena dūtavacasāpi vijṛmbhamāṇa-
saṃrambhametadavalokya surāricakram|
śaṅke kulācalakulaṃ kalaviṅkapota-
parysapakṣapavanāhatibaddhakampam||12||
yadbālabhāvasulabhaṃ śaśalakṣmamauli-
dūto 'bhyadhādayamaśaṅkitacittavṛttiḥ|
vaktuṃ kṣamaṃ pitṛgṛhe tadaśeṣameva
śrotāsti yatra rabhasena sa mātṛvargaḥ||13||
trailokyasāragurudhāma sadaḥ kilaita-
nnaiva smaśānamaśivātma śivāśavāḍhyam|
daityā ime ripukulācalacakravāla-
niṣpeṣakalpamaruto na gaṇaplavaṃgāḥ||14||
daityādhirājavinipātavibhīṣikābhi-
rabhyetya bhāyayasi dūta diteḥ sutānyat|
tadvyāhataṃ laghughanāghanamuktatoya-
dhārābhireti na yataḥ śamamaurvavahniḥ||15||
nirjitya saṃyugamukhe surarājacakra-
mapyātmasājjagadakāri yadaiva daityaiḥ|
kvāsau tadā samabhavatkathayendumauliḥ
skando 'thava kva nu gaṇāḥ kva nu te kva nandī||16||
āśvāsayannasilatāvanatālavṛnta-
vātairnṛsiṃhanakharakṣatavigrahāṃ ye|
lakṣmīṃ punarditijarājakulasya kāla-
daṇḍapracaṇḍaparipīvarabāhudaṇḍāḥ||17||
kiṃ tairna nandanagatairdayitājanasya
gīrvāṇapauruṣamiva svarucā hasantī|
āpānabandhamuditairapanidraratna-
puṣpāvataṃsaracanā kriyate 'surendraiḥ||18||
(yugalakam)
kiṃ vāvalokanakutūhalibhistrilokyā-
māruhya bāhujitadevavimānavīthīḥ|
nābhrāmyatāsurabhaṭaiḥ samarāttagandha-
gandharvakiṃpuruṣagītavinodyamānaiḥ||19||
māṇikyapuṣpabharamantharakalpavalī-
līlāgṛhodaragatairharadūta daityaiḥ|
kiṃ nānvabhūyata vidagdhavilāsadigdha-
mugdhārivāravanitāratakelilīlā||20||
kiṃ vā na vibhramavibhūṣitadaityanārī-
hastāravindapadadurlalito gṛhāntaḥ|
adhyāvasankaravimṛṣṭakalaṅka eti
yāthārthyameva gṛhacandra iti sma candraḥ||21||
kiṃ vāvarodhanavadhūdayitatvapakṣa-
pātātsuraiḥ satatasaṃnihitīkṛtārkāḥ|
svādhīnavallabhatayā pratipannahāri-
hāsā vyalokiṣata no na gṛhāmbujinyaḥ||22||
piṅgasphuratkiraṇakesaraśāritāśā-
smerasya no kimupadīkriyate surendraiḥ|
utkhātaśeṣaphaṇabhṛtphaṇacakravāla-
māṇikyapuṣparacitā mama maṅgalasrak||23||
vispaṣṭasaṃhṛtanirargalasaptaloka-
pūrapragalbharasitā mṛdumañjugarjāḥ|
kiṃ me na yāmapaṭahatvamavāpnuvanti
saudāmnīkanakakoṇabhṛtaḥ kṣayābdāḥ||24||
prāleyaśailataṭakānanadevatābhi-
rabhyetya no mṛgamadāgurukuṅkumena|
saṃpādyate kimavarodhavadhūjanasya
daityādhirājapuri vibhramamaṇḍanaśrīḥ||25||
daityādhipairyudhi jitasya mṛṇālasūtra-
garbhe sthitirbhayavaśatpunaratra mā bhūt|
nonmūlitāḥ kimamarādhiopateritīva
maddantibhirbhavanakānanapaṅkajinyaḥ||26||
kiṃ vā vighaṭṭanavirugṇasuparṇaketu-
nābhīhradāmbujajaradbisadaṇḍakhaṇḍaiḥ|
daityairapuṣyata mama vyapahṛtya harmya-
vāpīṣu na druhiṇadhoraṇahaṃsapaṅktiḥ||27||
vispaṣṭabhaṅgalaghucāpalatāparītaḥ
sa śrīphalaikarasiko harirāhavāgre|
sthairyaṃ bibharti kuta eva viśaṅkaṭeṣu
daityādhirājakaravālalatāgṛheṣu||28||
cintābharānatamukhapratibimbalagna-
lolaikakuṇḍalasitetararatnakhaṇḍam|
tasyācireṇa dayitā vahati stanaṃ 'srī-
rviśrāntaṣaṭcaraṇacakramivāravindam||29||
lakṣmyā bhaviṣyati raṇe bhayabaddhakampa-
lolāṅguliślathagṛhītakarālanālam|
visraṃsi sāndradalamaṇḍalapakṣmakhaṇḍa-
mutkarṇikaṃ tadapi vibhramapuṇḍarīkam||30||
pratyagramecakarucirvikarālalola-
kallolapīvarakarāhatapuṣkaraśrīḥ|
svacchandameva cakṛṣe sahasāśu yena
sīrāṅkuśena kariṇīva kalindakanyā||31||
saṃkhye jitasya halino 'pi mayaiti tasya
nūnaṃ trapābharavhastatayottamāṅgam|
antarnigūḍhamaṇiśāraśiraḥsahasra-
bhārātigauravavaśādiva bandhuratvam||32||
(yugalakam)
krīḍāpatattrirabhasotthajighṛkṣayārā-
tkṣipto mayāpi vinatātanayasya tasya|
pāśaḥ prasādanavilagnabhujaṃgabhoga-
līlāṃ puraiti caraṇāṅgulikoṭilagnaḥ||33||
kodaṇḍamaṇḍalakaṭukvaṇitaṃ madīya-
māyodhane śrutavato hṛdayātsmarāreḥ|
dhairyaṃ gamiṣyati niruddhaśarīrabhīru-
cittasthabhītipariṇāmavaśādivoccaiḥ||34||
kodaṇḍamandaragiriśravaṇāntakṛṣṭa-
maurvīkṛtāhighaṭitonnatapṛṣṭhabhāgaḥ|
yasyācyuto 'pyabhidaduṣṇamarīcibimba-
durdarśabhāsuramukhastripuraṃ pṛṣatkaḥ||35||
muñcanti śātravavadhūnayanāravinda-
mālāḥ karāhatapayodharamaṇḍalāgram|
adyāpi dīpitapuratrayatāyamāna-
dhūmābhighātaghaṭanādiva yasya bāṣpam||36||
ālambitāṃ karajakūṭaśikhāvidaṣṭa-
tārāgaṇāṃ vapuṣi vīkṣya mṛgendrakṛttim|
yasyojjhitaḥ śucimarīcicayaścakāsti
bhītyeva lakṣmahariṇena kirīṭacandraḥ||37||
ūrdhvekṣaṇānalamanindhanamapyavaimi
dhatte mayā yudhi haraḥ sa vijīyamānaḥ|
roṣānubandhamalinālikapaṭṭapṛṣṭha-
niṣṭhyūtdhūmaśabalīkṛtavisphuliṅgam||38||
(cakkalakam)
ākūṇitekṣaṇamukhasya kṛpāṇayaṣṭi-
reṣā raṇeṣu patitorasi candramauleḥ|
hārīkṛtoragaphaṇāmaṇiśāṇakoṇa-
kāṣakrameṇa masṛṇībhavati kṣaṇānnaḥ||39||
paśyasyavaśyamacireṇa vikhaṇḍyamāna-
dordaṇḍadarparabhasasya mayā raṇeṣu|
śyāmāyamānamalikekṣaṇavahnidhūma-
cchāyāvilaṅghitamivānanaminduauleḥ||40||
āpātajarjaritajahnusutājalaugha-
nirmṛṣṭalāñchanakalaṅka ivācchalekhaḥ|
haste yaśoṅkura ivaiti purā harasya
helā jayena mama so 'pi kirīṭacandraḥ||41||
āyodhane 'pi vijitasya mayā smarāre-
rūrdhvekṣaṇānalaśikhābhihato lalāṭe|
pāṇiḥ puraiti ghaṭanāṃ nakhakoṭiraśmi-
saṃdehitāmalakirīṭaśaśāṅkakhaṇḍaḥ||42||
pīnāntarālaparivartitamatkṛpāṇa-
cchāyānubandhabahalacchavikālakūṭam|
kaṇṭhaṃ bibharti na cirādiva saṃbhramārta-
śailādhirājatanayekṣitamindumauliḥ||43||
cakrīkṛtātanudhanurguṇaguñjitena
saṅgrāmamūrdhni mayi rundhati śailakuñjān|
jihretu tasya hṛdayaṃ tanulagnabhīru-
cittārdhabhāgaviditacyutadhairyabandham||44||
nirdhautakajjalalavāmapi baddhaghora-
mūrchāndhakāragahanāṃ ruditena gaurī|
nyastāñjanāmiva vidhāsyati pakṣmapaṅkti-
rudvṛttatārakamayūkhaśikhāvalībhiḥ||45||
cintāgṛhītadayitāśithilopagūḍha-
kaṇṭhasya manyubharaduḥsthitacittavṛtteḥ|
śayyāntare sairidivaiṣyati bhaṅgamaśu
sā vartanī rasikatānugatā smarāreḥ||46||
tāraṃ śarāsanaguṇakvaṇitaṃ bhayena
saṃstambhitaśravaṇatālamudañcitākṣāḥ|
ākarṇayantu samare mama janmasāma-
ghoṣodayātirabhasādiva diggajendrāḥ||47||
grāsīkṛtākhilajagattritayo 'dhunaiva
sāndrāndhakāramalināmasurādhināthāḥ|
kiṃ dhūmavartimiva tāmapi kālarātri-
mekaḥ pibāmi bhavatāmadhunā purastāt||48||
nighnannakheṭakhaṭakāmukhahastakṛṣṭa-
maurvīvinirgalavinirgatamārgaṇaughaiḥ|
tāṃ revatīmapi khaṭākhumavaimi saṃkhya-
mārge 'tiśuṣkamalinacchavidehayaṣṭim||49||
āropya kiṃ punarapi bhramamuṣṇaraśmi-
bimbaṃ krameṇa harihetijigīṣayaikaḥ|
ṭaṅkābhighātavinikuṭṭitatanniśāta-
tejaśchaṭābhiraparaṃ ghaṭayāmi cakram||50||
māṇikyakandukamivoṣṇamarīcibimba-
māsphoṭya pāṇikamalena salīlametat|
kurve tadīyaśikhigarbhamayūkhatāmra-
mārūḍhapākamiva kiṃ kṣitipīṭhapṛṣṭham||51||
abhyāhatā nipatatā karavālamegha-
dhārājalena gurusaṃgaradurdineṣu|
muñcantu tāvadadhunā cirasaṃbhṛtaṃ ta-
mūṣmāṇamunnatijuṣaḥ pratipakṣaśailāḥ||52||
muktāśilāśakalakomalabhāsi bāla-
bhāre 'stu duḥkhavidhurā camarīva tāvat|
ucchrāyi daityapatikīcakacakravāla-
bhagne 'dhunā yaśasi nirjaravaṃśalakṣmīḥ||53||
gāmbhīryarecitamanūrjitakaiṭabhāri-
tāpānubandhavisaratvamabhīkṣṇamāptam|
tatstokameva surasainyamavaimi tāva-
dāyodhane 'tra marumārgajalāyamānam||54||
manye nisargamahatāṃ hṛdayeṣu pūrva-
micchaiva niṣpratighatāmanaghāṃ vahantī|
paścādupāyaghaṭanā sakaleṣu kṛtya-
vastuṣvananyasadṛśīmupayāti siddhim||55||
vispaṣṭamuṣṭighaṭanāguṇayogabhāja-
stīkṣṇīkṛtā bhaṭajanena kṛpāṇapaṭṭāḥ|
kāryaprāndhaghaṭanāvahitaiḥ sunīti-
margāśca bhīruhṛdayairnanu saprapañcāḥ||56||
yasminnisargamahatāṃ caramaḥ prakṛṣṭa-
mārambhamādyamatiśeta iha prayatnaḥ|
taṃ tāratamyabharasaṃbhṛtijṛmbhamāṇa-
saṃrambhaśūnyaphalamādriyate 'vidagdhaḥ||57||
aurjityamujjhitavatāṃ bata vītaśaṅkaṃ
kāryaṃ kariṣyati ca nītiviṣūcikā vaḥ(cet)|
vandhyāsutaḥ śaśaviṣāṇadhanurvidhāya
mokṣyatyavaśyamacireṇa sa nākabāṇān||58||
vispaṣṭaluttha(ṇṭha)nakathāṃ vijahīta nīti-
kanthāmamantharaparākramamārgapanthāḥ|
tandrālubhirna sulabha nanu dhairyaśaurya-
śauṭīryahāryahṛdayā kvacideva lakṣmīḥ||59||
nūnaṃ malīmasapayodharamaṇḍalāsu
jātāsu dikṣviva vipakṣanitambinīṣu|
saṃprāpyate madhujiteva viṭaṅkaratna-
paryaṅkaśeṣaghaṭitena mayāpi nidrā||60||
kṛpaṇavirutilagnā rātriśobhādhare 'smi-
nnabhipatati tamisrā dhūsare matkṛpāṇe|
virahavidhuracetāḥ pārśvamutsrakṣyati drā-
ktuhinaśikharikanyā cakravākīva bhartuḥ||61||
ityāvirbhūtadarpaprasaramabhidadhatyandhake baddhamanyā-
vālakṣyāntarvivakṣāsphuradadharapuṭaścukṣubhe kāñcanākṣaḥ|
ratnaprālambamālāmalakiraṇaśikhānirjharāmbhaśchaṭābhi-
rbibhrannirvāpyamāṇātanukuliśaśikhiploṣamuccairivoraḥ||62||
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye andhakāsuravyāhāro nāma pañcatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ||
ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ sargaḥ|
bibhratkalindatanayāmiva candramauli-
līlādhṛtatridaśanirjhariṇīrṣyayārāt|
śyāmīkṛtārkakaracakrakirīṭakūṭa-
koṭisphuranmarakatāṃśuśikhena mūrdhnā||1||
dolāyamānamaṇikuṇḍalakoṭilagna-
ratnāṃśupuñjaparipiñjaritāvataṃsaḥ|
asaṃsthalena vikaṭāṃsataṭe 'bhihatya
vyaṃsāsuraṃ sa nikaṭasthitamityavādīt||2||
(yugalakam)
he daityanātha kimavastuvijṛmbhamāṇa-
saṃrambhamityabhidadhāsi vibhinnadhairyaḥ|
tiṣṭhatsu dānabhaṭeṣvapi saṃyugājñā-
lābhonmukheṣu dalitārikulācaleṣu||3||
tatsveva saṃnihitadiggjagaṇḍabhitti-
viṣpandamānamadapaṅkakṛtāṅkureṣu|
daityendrabāhuṣu ripukṣayakālarātri-
mālambate tava karaḥ karavālavallīm||4||
pārśve vilokayasi kiṃ bhrukuṭiṃ vidhāya
kopātsavepathukaraḥ kuliśaṃ jighṛkṣuḥ|
tatkāryameṣa kurute tava bāhureva
helāvirugṇasakalāhitaśailacakraḥ||5||
āyodhayatyadhikamekatamāpi kāci-
dalpāpi te bhaṭavarūthavatī vipakṣam|
paryaptimeti śikhinaḥ samiduddhatasya
dagdhuṃ sphuliṅgakaṇikāpi samāsajantī||6||
medhāsitastava bhujo nanu mekalādriḥ
keyūrameṣa śikharaṃ vikaṭaṃ bibharti|
nistriṃśayaṣṭiriyamatra viṭaṅkasīmni
hālāhalolbaṇalatā vidadhāti moham||7||
satyaṃ tvameva sakalaṃ surarājacakra-
mekaḥ kṣaṇāddalayituṃ samare samarthaḥ|
bhasmīkarotu vaḍavānalamantareṇa
kallolakāṇḍakalilaṃ ka ivāmbu sindhoḥ||8||
tejastvayā niśitamārgaṇaṭaṅkaghātai-
stvaṣṭreva śātitamanargalamiddhadhāmnaḥ|
āropitasya samarabhramamātatāyi-
lokasya dīptataramāracitaṃ ca cakram||9||
ākarṇitena vacasā bhavato bibharmi
yatsatyamutpulakapūrabharāṃ svamūrtim|
ko 'pyeṣa śabdamahimā jaladasya yena
ratnāṅkuraprasavameti vidūrabhūmiḥ||10||
vākyaṃ bravītu suvacāḥ sadasadviveka-
yogyo bhavāniva bhavedyadi tatra kaścit|
grāvṇaḥ prasūtimadhigacchati hema yasmā-
nnāsau kvacidbhavati tasya nikāṣapaṭṭaḥ||11||
prajñā mamālpavibhavāpi vivekayoga-
meṣā kiyantamapi naiva nirasyatīha|
jyotsnātapaṃ bahulapakṣaparikṣatāpi
nātmānurūpamamṛtāṃśukalā jahāti||12||
naisargikīṃ virasatāṃ dadhato 'pyabhīkṣṇa-
māseduṣo 'pi jaḍimānamagaṇyavṛtteḥ|
vākyasya sāraguruṇo gurubhiḥ parīkṣya-
mantaḥ prasūtirupalādiva kāñcanasya||13||
arhanti meghamalināḥ sadasi grahītu-
meter 'thatattvamadhunā vacasi sthitaṃ naḥ|
daityādhipā madhukarā iva puṣpadhūli-
garbhe kṛtavyatikaraṃ makarandaleśam||14||
nirbhidyamānahṛdayocchalitaṃ vyudasta-
hastasya pañcabhirupoḍhanṛsiṃhamūrteḥ|
roṣādiva pratimitairnakhadarpaṇeṣu
daityendraśoṇitamapīyata yasya vaktraiḥ||15||
daṃṣṭrāgṛhītagurusaṃbhramabhūtadhātrī-
pātālapātapunaruktibhayena ruddham|
antarvighurṇanavisaṃsthulasaptaloka-
māsīdvarāhavapuṣaḥ śvasitaṃ ca yasya||16||
maccakrakoṭiparivartanasaṃdhibandha-
cchedārtimeṣa kathayiṣyati dānavānām|
jīvanvidhuṃtuda itīva purā vicintya
yena vyadhāyi mukhamaṇḍalamātraśeṣaḥ||17||
saṅgrāmamūrdhani vipūrayituṃ na yena
yatnādapi sphuṭamarpāyata pāñcajanyaḥ|
niḥśvāsanunnahṛdayāspadasaptaloka-
saṃsthānaruddhavikaṭānanarandhramārgaḥ||18||
lakṣmīkarākalitavibhramapuṇḍarīka-
līlāvamṛṣṭacaraṇo yudhi śārṅgapāṇiḥ|
cintāpathaṃ na kathameti sa daityamārga-
saṃhāratigmakarabimbasudarśano vaḥ||19||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam)
niṣṭhyūtaniṣṭhuraśikhānalavisphuliṅga-
piṅgīkṛtāmbaratalā samarāṅgaṇe vaḥ|
kaumodakī smṛtipathātskhalitā kathaṃ nu
tadbāhudaṇḍaghaṭitāriyugakṣayolkā||20||
sahyeta kena raṇavartmani nandako 'pi
kaṇṭhacchidārasabharādiva yo 'surāṇām|
kalmāṣitoṣṇakiraṇāṃśukarālaraśmi-
rekhāchalena kurute 'nyakṛpāṇasargam||21||
yasyāhaveṣu parivartajuṣo murāri-
hastāṅgulīkisalayāgragatasya dūram|
sīmantyamānatimirāḥ kiraṇairniśāta-
dhārāvakhaṇḍanabhiyeva diśo 'sasastruḥ||22||
digdevatākanakadarpaṇavisphuliṅgaḥ
sarpannatarpyata janārdanadarpavarṣma|
dhārākṛśānurapi yasya surārikaṇṭha-
nāḍīnirargalagalatkṣatajacchaṭābhiḥ||23||
cakraṃ kṣameta yudhi tatka ivāsya roddhu-
muddhūtadhūsaritadikpaṭalāndhakāram|
unnidrakundadalakomalakīrticandra-
lekhopabṛṃhaṇasahasramarīcibimbam||24||
(tilakam)
mā bhūtpattrapavanena kapālabandha-
saṃdhirdvidhā dalita eṣa divaspṛthivyoḥ|
dhyātveti yo 'ṇḍaśakalāduditaḥ kṣaṇena
caṇḍetaroḍḍayanaḍambariko 'mbare 'bhūt||25||
helādilaṅghitajagattritayo bhujaṃga-
saṃdānitaḥ śatamakhānujadehabhāraḥ|
yenohyate viyati vājigaṇena dūra-
muṣṇatviṣo ratha iva sphuradekacakraḥ||26||
puñjīkṛtoragasahasrajighatsayeva
pakṣānilena ghanavartmani yaścakāra|
kṣmāmaṇḍalaṃ vidalitācalacakravāla-
mekībhavatkṣubhitasaptamahāsamudram||27||
brahmāṇḍagarbhamapi yo 'dhivasannijāṇḍa-
piṇḍādanirgamanameva vidāṃcakāra|
digbhittisaṃkaṭavikūṇitapakṣma(kṣa)pālī-
mandakramoḍḍayanaduḥsthitacittavṛttiḥ||28||
yasyāvatīrṇamadhivāridhi śaiśave 'pi
līlāgṛhītagajakacchapamañjasārāt|
trastālagardagṛhiṇītaralākṣidṛṣṭa-
mutkampikātarajanārdanakūrmamāsīt||29||
tārkṣyaḥ sa cintya udakādiva dugdhasindho-
rādatta yo 'mṛtarasaṃ suraguptibandhāt|
cañcvagradaṣṭapṛthuśeṣamṛṇālakāṇḍa-
pātālagarbhanalinītaṭarājahaṃsaḥ||30||
(ṣaḍbhiḥ kulakam)
ātāmradanturaphaṇāṅgulikoṭibhāga-
vispaṣṭaratnakarajāṃśumucā kathaṃcit|
uttambhitā vikaṭabhogabhujena yasya
pātālatālu tarasāvanirāviśantī||31||
kṣmāmaṇḍaloddharaṇalagnamahāvarāha-
vinyastaniṣṭhurakhurāgravikhaṇḍyamānāḥ|
piṅgaiḥ parāgapaṭalairnavacīnapiṣṭa-
piṣṭātakaśriyam adhurmaṇayo 'pi yasya||32||
kalpāvadhāvadhipayodhi yamekameva
baddhāspadaṃ madhuripuḥ śayanīcakāra|
kukṣipraviṣṭabhuvanatrayacitraceṣṭā-
vyāhāravibhramaviluptasamādhinidraḥ||33||
śeṣaḥ sa yasya bhuvanapralayāvatāra-
paryāptatāṇḍavaparikramanamyamānām|
dikkuñjarāṃsaśikharaskhalitāṃ kathaṃci-
durvīṃ dadhacchvasiti gāḍhamupoḍhakhedaḥ||34||
bhrūbhaṅgabhīṣaṇamarīṇaruṣo raṇeṣu
tasya kṣameta ka ivekṣitumindumauleḥ|
